loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Shorena

texts.en:
Shorena is 27 years old. She lives in Sagarejo District with her family: her husband Bachuki, her parents-in-law and the grandfather of her husband. 

Bachuki works in construction and is paid a wage for his work. Shorena and her mother-in-law are teachers, and the grandfather is a pensioner. 

The family earns their living through agriculture. They have a milk cow and three calves, and they produce yogurt. The family has 25 hens as well. They sell yogurt and eggs on the local open market. The family's average monthly income is 1,000 Laris.

Shorena requested a loan for purchasing more calves. She will raise them, and after a year she will be able to double production.,  Sales of cheese and, with it, the family's income will significantly increase. All members of the family will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves to raise as milk cows.

loans.name: Dashamir

texts.en:
Dashamir is just 23 years old. He's a hard worker and a very bright young man. The staff of VisionFund Albania is very, very happy to help him out. 

Dashamir is a talented cobbler. He inherited the skills from his father, who started the business about 18 years back. Nine years later he became ill.  Dashamir was 14 at that time, and ever since he has been operating the shoe repair shop all on his own. 

He is busy, and he has established a good clientele, thanks to his hard work and personable nature. He is liked by almost everyone in his town of some 10,000 residents.

Dashamir has applied for a Kiva loan through VFA in order to purchase materials he needs for shoe repairing.  His later plans include creating a family and expanding his shop. 

He is extremely appreciative of Kiva and VisionFund Albania for supporting him in this matter. In particular, Dashamir wants to thank all the Kiva potential lenders for their kindness and generosity.

loans.use: To purchase materials needed for shoe repairing.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.en:
Abraham operates a retail store where he sells items such as sodas, sugar, salt, bread, etc . He has been involved in this business for five years and employs one staff member. His business is located within a competitive business area and his primary customers are farmers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be poor infrastructure making it difficult for customers to access the business premises. He also has a dairy farm and does farming. His business goal is to run a wholesale shop within five years. He hopes that in the future he will be a successful businessman and farmer. 

Abraham is a married man. He has two children, ages 1 and 3 years old. He describes himself as a focused and disciplined man. Abraham has taken out three loans of 20,000; 40,000 and 70,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) which he has managed to repay. 

Abraham will use this 11,100 KES loan to buy a water tank for his family and household use.

loans.use: to buy a water tank for his family and household use.

loans.name: Cristo Nos Guia Group

texts.es: El banco comunal cristo nos guía esta conformado por pabla Isabel, Nora Elena, Juana Francisca, Angela del Rosario, Marisela del Carmen, Raquel Verónica, Martha, Juana de Dios, Justina, Lisbeth Lucia, Olga del Carmen estas emprendedoras han demostrado su responsabilidad, son personas muy trabajadoras, luchadoras, con necesidad de trabajar y salir adelantes con sus familias, en el caso de pabla Isabel es la coordinadota del banco su actividad económica es el servicio de costura  en el cual se desempeña desde hace diez años, servicio que le brinda a los pobladores de su comunidad, en la actualidad tiene mucha clientes gracias al buen servicio en la elaboración de prenda como: blusas, faldas, uniforme de niños para colegios, pantalones, shorts entre otros.
texts.en:
Pabla Isabel, Nora Elena, Juana Francisca, Angela del Rosario, Marisela del Carmen, Raquel Verónica, Martha, Juana de Dios, Justina, Lisbeth Lucia, and Olga del Carmen are members of the  “Cristo Nos Guía” [God Guides Us] communal bank.  These entrepreneurs are very hard-working and tenacious people who need to work and get ahead with their families.

Pabla Isabel is the coordinator of the bank.  Her business activity is providing sewing services.  She has been doing this for ten years, and she provides her services to the inhabitants of her community.  She now has a lot of customers thanks to her good services in making garments like blouses, skirts, children’s school uniforms, pants, and shorts, among others.

loans.use: to make garments like blouses, skirts, children’s school uniforms, pants, and shorts, among others.

loans.name: Maria's Group

texts.es:
La señora Aura Marina esta casada, tiene 26 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijos el cual esta estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía, a la elaboración de bolsas ecológicas, usando papel, silicon e hilos,  inicio este negocio con la ayuda de su esposo, y lleva 4 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a comercio.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra  de papel, silicon e hilos, solo así mejorar su producción de bolsas de papel. el el futuro espera ver que su negocio superar sus ganancias y tenga la opción de apoya a su esposo con la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Aura Marina is 26 years old and married.  She has a third grade education.  She has one child who attends school.  She devotes herself to handicrafts.

She makes ecological bags using paper, silicone, and thread.  She started this business with her husband’s help, and she has four years of experience. She has her husband’s support; he is a merchant.

She organized a group in order to be able to request a loan.  She will use the loan to buy paper, silicone, and thread.  It is only this way that she will improve her production of the bags made from paper.  In the future she hopes to see her business improve its earnings and to have the chance to support her husband with the construction of their house.

loans.use: to buy paper, silicone, and thread.

loans.name: Melbert

texts.en: Melbert, age 35, is a vigorous and diligent man. He is a farmer and has been eight years in the farming business. He does this business to be able to support his family, especially his three children. It was a hard path to take on this source for income, but Melbert has no choice because he was not able to finished his education. Despite that, he devotes himself to working hard, and he is requesting a loan of 20,000 Philippine pesos to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use for his farm. Hopefully he can increase his income to save for the education of his children so they can avoid repeating his fate.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Elene

texts.en:
Elene, 44 years old, lives in a small village in the Sagarejo District with her 25-year-old son Zura, her daughter-in-law, and two little grandchildren. Zura works in construction, while Elene has three milking cow from which she produces cheese and yogurt, selling her products at the local open market. The family's total average monthly income is 1000 Laris.

Elene has requested a loan for purchasing calves to raise in order to increase milk and cheese production. This will result in increased family income and improved living conditions. Elene hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина 29 летняя женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее дети Абдуллочон, Хусейнчон и Махсума еще не совершеннолетние. Ее муж предприниматель. Он поддерживает Мадину во всех ее делах, но его бизнес в последнее время не эффективный и он не может поддержать жену с деньгами.  Мадина очень грамотная и высококвалифицированная. Она преподает экономическую дисциплину в университете. Студенты очень уважают ее. Зарплата Мадины не хватает для ремонта ее квартиры, так как уже несколько лет она хочет отремонтировать ее. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 6000 сомони для ремонта квартиры. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Madina is a 29 year old woman. She is married and raising three children. Her children Abdullochon, Huseynchon and Makhsum are not yet adults. Her husband is a businessman. He supports Madina in all her affairs, but his business has not been effective and he is not able to support his wife with money. 

Madina is very competent and highly skilled. She teaches economy at the university. The students have great respect for her. Marina's salary is not enough for repairing her flat, and she's wanted to repair it for several years already. She requests a loan in the amount of 6,000 somoni for the repair of the flat. She hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for repairing her flat

loans.name: Genesis De Xeabaj Group

texts.es:
La señora Anastasia es madre soltera, tiene 28 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene2 hijos los cuales aun no estudian, se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, inicio este negocio viendo la necesidad de sustentar na su familia, ya que no ha tenido su esposo, hasta el momento tiene 6 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderías para la venta: guipiles, blusas, sabanas, fajas, cintas, etc. En el futuro quiere tener un comedor para vender comida y bebida, ya que al momento ha iniciado también la venta de refacciones. Las demás integrantes se dedican a la elaboración, compra y venta de trajes típicos.
texts.en:
Anastasia is a single mother. She is 28 years old. She didn't have the opportunity to study and has 2 children who have not studied. She buys and sells traditional clothing. She started this business seeing the need to support her family, since she hasn't had a spouse. So far, she has 6 years of experience.

She organizes a group to be able to request a loan which she will use for the purchase of merchandise for sale: traditional blouses, blouses, sheets, woven sashes, belts, etc. In the future, she wants to have a cafeteria, to sell food and drink, since at the moment she has started to sell refreshments. The other members make, sell, and purchase traditional costumes.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарине 33 года. Она разведенная и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Ее сына зовут Фирдавс  и ему 13 лет, а дочке 9 лет, ее зовут Шукрона. После развода с мужем ей было очень трудно обеспечить своих детей, так как у нее не было источника дохода. Материальное требование семьи заставила Зарину начать свой бизнес. Таким образом, 6 лет тому назад она начала купле продажей женской обуви. Сейчас она является одной из успешных бизнес леди. Она успешно продает женскую обувь на рынке. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 7000 сомони для покупки обуви с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zarina is 33 years old. She is divorced and is raising two children. Her son is called Firdavs, and he is 13 years old, while her daughter is 9 and called Shukrona. 

After the divorce from her husband, it was very difficult for Zarina to provide for her children, since she did not have a source of income. The material needs of the family made Zarina start her business. Thus, six years ago she started buying and selling women's shoes. Currently she is one of the successful business ladies. She has successfully been selling women's shoes at the market. 

Zarina requests a loan in the amount of 7,000 somoni for the purchase of shoes with an aim to increase her working capital. She hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for reselling

loans.name: Usmonbek

texts.ru: Усмонбек 39 летний женатый мужчина и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Он всегда старается обеспечить семью со всеми удобствами. Уже 22 года он занимается услугой такси. Он очень трудолюбивый и общительный человек. Его бизнес идет отлично, но его доход не позволяет ему построить новую кухню. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 7800 сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Usmonbek is a 39 year old married man, raising two children. He always tries to provide his family with all amenities. He has been providing a taxi service for 22 years already. He is a very hard working and outgoing man. 

Usmonbek's business is going well, but his income does not allow him to build a new kitchen. He requests a loan in the amount of 7,800 somoni for the purchase of building materials. He hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase wood and cement for building a new kitchen

loans.name: Rafia's Group

texts.en:
Rafia is a 33-year-old woman and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and five children. Rafia is a member of a 2-person lending group has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for buying accessories for her husband’s shop.

She wants the financing to invest in buying accessories like cell phone batteries, chargers, casings, head phones, cell phone bags, etc. for her husband’s cell phone accessories shop. As this shop is the only source of income for their family, she wants to expand it through this financing and make her life happy. 

Her husband is very experienced and professional in his dealings and has been operating his business for the past four years. 

Rafia is confident that this loan will greatly contribute towards a substantial increase in their monthly income.

loans.use: to buy accessories for her husband’s cell phone accessories shop.

loans.name: Gerishom

texts.en:
Gerishom is a married man. He has four children with ages ranging from 4 years to 12 years. He describes himself to be a focused and well-organized man.  

He operates a motorcycle where he provides transportation services. He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located within a busy and potential market for transport and his primary customers are employees from his home town and business persons. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high cost of spare parts for the motorcycle. 

He will use the Kes 21,000 loan to purchase a water tank for his family’s use. 

His business goal is to buy at least five taxis within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will buy a taxi saloon car (sedan). 

Gerishom had taken a loan which he managed to pay. In addition, he runs a dairy farm and sells milk.

loans.use: to buy a water tank for his family's use.

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Ольга – из Мелитополя. Она торгует детской и подростковой одеждой и обувью на одном из местных рынков своего родного города. У нее есть своя семья, муж и двое детей. Ольга – среднестатистический предприниматель, который сталкивается с разного рода проблемами, как, например, изменение курса доллара, спады торговли. Однако Ольга не унывает – он трудолюбивая и ответственная, всегда старается развиваться и двигаться дальше. 

Ольга собирается вложить кредит в размере 10 000 гривен в пополнение торгового запаса детской одежды. С увеличением товарного запаса она сможет дальше развивать свой бизнес, увеличивая объемы продаж и прибыль.
texts.en:
Olga is from Melitopol. She sells children's and adolescent clothing and shoes at one of the local markets of her hometown. She has a family, a husband and two children. Olga is an average entrepreneur, who has faced various problems, like the change in the dollar exchange rate and a downturn in trade. Still, Olga is not discouraged, she is hard working and responsible, and always tries to develop and move on. 

Olga decided to invest a loan in the amount of 10,000 hryvnia in replenishing her stock of children's clothing. With the increase in inventory, she can further develop her business, increasing sales and profits.

loans.use: replenish her stock of children's clothing

loans.name: Abdumannon

texts.en:
Abdumannon is a 33-year-old man, married and the father of three children. All of them are already in school.

He has been busy with animal husbandry for three years. Thanks to his good experience in this field and his influence over his animals, he is able to obtain animals for sale but it brings in little income. It does not allow him to provide for the needs of his family and build a new house because his family is large and needs a big house. This year he is going to build a new house with modern planning. He is asking for a loan of 4000 Tajikistani somoni (TJS).

This loan will help him buy building materials to build new house. In this way he will provide high quality of living conditions for his family and put an end to the problems with their house. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is 37 years old. She lives in a small village of Sagarejo District with her family: her husband, Valerian, father-in-law, and two children (14 and 16 years old). Both of them study in the local school. 

Valerian is a driver of a truck. He serves the local population and gets service fees for the work. Nino’s father-in-law is a pensioner. Nino runs the family’s agricultural business with two milking cows and six calves. She sells milk in her village. 

In addition to cattle, she has a plot of land, where maize is grown. Nino works hard on her plot during spring and summer seasons to get a good harvest. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Lari.

Nino requested a loan for purchasing feed for the cattle. She will purchase hay, which will be used for feeding the cows and calves during the fall and winter seasons. Hay is cheap now and the price increases by 30-40% in the fall months. Nino significantly saves on the costs of feeding the cattle. 

Since the cows and calves will be fed properly in the winter, they will give a planned amount of milk to the family. This will help Nino to increase her dairy farm and improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her cattle.

loans.name: Irma

texts.en:
Irma is 43 years old. She lives in a small village in the Sagarejo District with her family: her husband Gia and their two children, who are 18 and 20 years old. The younger son serves in the Army and the elder is a student. Gia works in construction and gets a service fee for the work. Irma runs an agricultural business. She has two milking cows and sells milk in nearby villages. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Lari.

Irma requested a loan for purchasing an additional dairy cow and feed. She will purchase hay, which will be used for feeding the cows during the fall and winter seasons. Hay is cheap now and the price increases by 30-40% in the fall months. Irma saves significantly on the costs of feeding the cattle. Since the cows will be fed properly in winter, they will give a planned amount of milk to the family. This will help Irma to increase her dairy farm and improve the living conditions of the family

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow and feed for cattle

loans.name: Yelena

texts.ru:
Елена – из Мелитополя. Она уже в течении 14 лет торгует на одном из рынков города детской одеждой и обувью. Торговое место у нее – собственное. Наиболее продаваемые товары - платья, кофты, блузы и обувь. 
Елена планирует вложить полученный от КИВА кредит в размере 15 000 гривен в покупку товара к школьному сезону, который в Украине начинается с 1 сентября. Однако родители уже в августе стараются подготовить ребенка к школе, закупив все необходимые канцтовары, форму и хорошую обувь.
texts.en:
Yelena is from Melitopol. She has been trading children's clothing and shoes at one of the city's markets for a period of 14 years already. The retail space she has is her own. The best selling items are dresses, sweaters, blouses and shoes.

Elena plans to invest the loan received from Kiva, in the amount of 15,000 hryvnia, in purchasing products for the school season, which starts on September 1 in Ukraine. However, parents try to prepare the children for school already in August, purchasing all necessary stationary, uniforms and good shoes.

loans.use: to purchase products for the school season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a water tank for family home use

loans.name: Tinatin

texts.en:
Tinatin is 27 years old. She is married and lives in a small village in the Sighnaghi District with her family: husband Mose, parents-in-law, grandmother, and two children (2 and 5 years old). The family members are busy with an agricultural business. They have a vineyard and a plot of land where various vegetables are grown, such as cucumbers, potatoes, tomatoes, and peppers. The family works hard on their agricultural land during the spring and summer seasons to get a good harvest. They pick grapes in late summer and produce wine. They sell harvested products and wine on the local open market. They also have milking cows and produce dairy products to sell on the local open market. Along with the agricultural business, they are busy with trading. They sell second-hand cloths in nearby villages.

Tinatin requested a loan to increase clothing stock. She will purchase seasonal clothes for resale. She will offer a wide assortment of the clothes to her customers and increase sales, and, consequently, her profit. She will reinvest part of the profit in the same business, and the other part will be used for improving family living conditions. Tinatin also plans to purchase piglets. She will raise them and sell them after several months with a price mark-up. Because of this, the living conditions of the family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal clothes

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a resident of Murang’a in Central Kenya where he lives with his family of three children all aged below eighteen years. He has been in farming since his teenage years and currently produces mainly tea, milk and maize for the local market.

Francis has requested a loan of 35,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) from Juhudi Kilimo to buy farm inputs and specifically fertilizer to boost both his tea and horticultural farming. He says this will boost his farm produce and enable him to earn income to pay for the education of his children.

He laments of poor weather conditions. He, however, appreciates Juhudi Kilimo's support to smallholder farmers.

loans.use: To buy farming fertilizer

loans.name: Eav

texts.en:
Eav is 50 years of age and is married with two children: one single child and one married child. She is a proud farmer who always works hard in the rice field to provide the family with income. She has been in this occupation for in the past 30 years. Eav is eager to uplift her family out of poverty and attain a better quality of life. Most of her income goes to food, commodities' costs, and allowances for her youngest child.

Now he has applied for a loan of $500 USD to purchase fertilizers, pesticides and some types of vegetables seeds for growing. She hopes to yield better crops through her purchased inputs for the improvement of her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, pesticides and some types of vegetables seeds for growing.

loans.name: Villamor

texts.en: Villamor is requesting a loan of 19,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to use in his farming business. He is 59 years of age and has had this occupation for over 25 years. He earns 20,000 PHP after every six months of hardship. His family is still experiencing insufficiency with his earnings, so he decided to ask for a loan. He wants to take this opportunity because it will allow him to improve his income. He has devoted himself to his business, to working hard and managing responsibly in order to repay his obligation.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Eng

texts.en:
Eng is 39 years old, married and has three children who are currently studying and need daily allowances. Eng is a crops grower living in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She has been operating this business for almost 12 years, earning approximately $4.10 USD per day. Upon harvest, Eng sells her products to local traders in her village. Her husband helps her in the business to ensure a good crop growth.

Eng would like to further improve and increase her crop production, so she is now asking for a loan for the sum of $500 USD to purchase bean seeds and potato plants for growing and pay her operating expenses in this process. With her tireless work and patience, she hopes that she can make progress in her business and yield satisfictory revenues.

loans.use: to purchase bean seeds and potato plants for growing and pay her operating expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Thary's Group

texts.en: Thary is a young 28-year-old mother of two dependent children, one of whom is still in school and the remaining one is under-aged for schooling. She and the rest for her family are originally from Kror Kor district of Pursat Province. To strive for the entire family, she has been working on rice farming with her husband for about 10 years as the major source of income. She also supplements additional income via raising chickens for resale. Thary has joined VisionFund for one cycle already and completely paid back the entire loan. The first loan has improved her standard of living gradually. Now she leads a group of two to seek for a new loan. She will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her rice field and to pay for harvesting fees. She hopes that she will earn more income so as to better off her family's living condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice field and to pay for harvesting fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his transportation vehicle

loans.name: Madlena

texts.en:
Madlena is 38 years old. She lives in a small village in the Sighnaghi district with her two sons, who are 16 and 19 years old. The younger son studies in the local school and the elder serves in the Army. Madlena runs an agricultural business. She has milking cows and produces cheese. Madlena sells cheese in her village. The total average monthly income of the family is 300 Laris, which is hardly enough for food for a three members of the family.  

Madlena requested a loan for purchasing piglets and feed for them. She will purchase feed for piglets and hay for cows, which will be used for feeding the cattle during the fall and winter seasons. Hay is cheap now and the price increases by 30-40% in the fall months. Madlena saves significantly on the costs of feeding the cattle. She will raise piglets and sell them after several months with a price mark-up. This will help her to increase her agricultural business and improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed for livestock

loans.name: Dala

texts.en:
Dala is 57 years old. She lives in a small village in the Kalauri District with her two sons (24 and 26 years old) and her mother-in-law, who is a pensioner. The younger son works at a private company and gets a monthly salary. The elder son and Dala run the family agricultural business with two milking cows and two pigs. Dala milks cows twice a day and produces cheese. She sells produced cheese on the local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 700 Laris.

Dala requested a loan for purchasing piglets and feed for them. She will purchase feed for piglets and hay for cows, which will be used for feeding the cattle during the fall and winter seasons. Hay is cheap now and the price increases by 30-40% in the fall months. Dala saves significantly on the costs of feeding the cattle. She will raise piglets and sell them after several months with a price mark-up. This will help her to increase her agricultural business and improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed for cattle

loans.name: C 8058 Ubumwe Group

texts.en: Seraphine is 36 years old and is married with three children between the ages of 6 and 10 years old. Seraphine sells various goods, such as vegetables and fruit. She is the president of the group called "C8058 Ubumwe" in the local language. Seraphine is the middle person in this group photo. She currently employs one person to help her and has six years of experience in her business. Seraphine operates her business from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day of the week except Sunday. She has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods, such as vegetables and fruits, to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save money for her future and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy various goods, such as vegetables, fruits, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Bessik

texts.en:
Besik is 41 years old. He lives in the Telavi District with his wife Larisa and his mother, who is a pensioner. Besik requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for an agricultural start-up business, but without any success. His loan request was rejected all the time because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 

Besik is an agricultural worker. He helps local farmers in their farms and gets a service fee for the work. The family also has a milking cow; the dairy products are partially consumed by the family and the other part is sold in the village. The average monthly income of the family is 250 Laris. This is hardly enough for food for a three member family. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the “subsistence poor” category. 

Besik requested a loan from Credo to start-up a pig farm. His loan request was approved in the frames of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages to provide business start-up and restart-up credits with soft conditions to country rural poor who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of low income. With the credit received, Besik will purchase piglets. He will place them in an old, empty farm building located in their yard. Besik will raise the piglets and sell them after several months with a price mark-up. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the income of the family. Their income will double and the family members will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase piglets

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is thirty years old, married, and has one child, who is two years old. He and his family live in the southeastern part of the country in a little town of approximately 10,000 residents. For many years, he worked with his brother as a taxi driver. In the past four years, Alfred started working for himself. He has been happy ever since and proudly explains, “Now I have more clients than my own brother, thanks to my customer skills.”  

Alfred is now requesting a loan to repair the taxi. He was able to put aside money all these past years, approximately $1000, yet something important came up just before his vehicle broke down and he spent that money. 

Alfred seeks Kiva lenders’ appreciation and gives his word to them that he will pay off the loan. He has proved his responsibility in the past because this is not his first loan through the VisionFund Albania institution.

loans.use: to get the car serviced at an auto repair shop

loans.name: Guliza

texts.en:
Guliza is 65 years old. She lives in the Baghdati District alone. Guliza requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for an agricultural start-up business, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected all the time because of low income and poor living conditions. 

Guliza has a small plot of land, where nut is grown. She sells nut in nearby villages. Along with her agricultural business, she is busy with trading. Guliza sells horseshoes in the village. Her average monthly income is 150 Laris. It is hardly enough for food. According to Credo estimations, she belongs to the “subsistence poor” category. 

Guliza requested loan from Credo to start-up a dairy farm. Her loan request was approved in the frames of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages to provide business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor, who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of low income. With the credit received, Guliza will purchase a dairy cow. She will place it in an old empty farm-building located in her yard. Guliza will work hard in the farm. She will produce cheese and sell it in the village. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the income of Guliza. Thus, she will be able to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Eveling

texts.es:
Doña Eveling, sigue con sus ventas de fritangas, en su casa de habitación todas las tardes, desde su juventud ha trabajado, para el apoyo de su familia, siendo madre soltera, sus cuatros hijos trabajan y aportan económicamente para los gastos. Su casa de habitación es de condición sencilla y que quiere mejorar para una mejor seguridad, estabilidad e higiene en  su vivienda.
Con este nuevo préstamo comprara dieciocho láminas de zinc, doce perlines, golosos, y levantar su techo y arranque de piedra, ya que tiene bloques, arena, para comenzar ah construir su pequeña casa de concreto. Esta mejora la está haciendo, con financiamiento en Afodenic, siendo posible a corto plazo.
texts.en:
Eveling is still selling fritangas from her houser in the afternoons. She has worked since her youth to support her family. She is a single mother of four children. They work and help her financially with expenses. Her house is of simple construction and she wants to improve it for security, stability and sanitation. 

With this new loan, she will buy eighteen zinc sheets, twelve metal bars, and screws. She will also raise the roof and put in the stone foundation. She has blocks and sand to start building her little concrete house. She is doing the home improvement with a loan from Afodenic, since it is possible short term.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting and metal bars to make her roof as de zinc y perlines para hacer su techo y aranque de piedra de su casa.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: Elvira es separada y vive sola, tiene un negocio de piñatas y ropa seminueva, su prioridad hasta ahora son sus clientes, le gusta atenderlos de una manera muy especial porque todos tienen gustos muy diferentes. Tiene en mente hacer crecer su negocio mediante la compra de mayor cantidad de materia prima para hacer otros tipos de piñatas diferentes a la que ya tiene y de esa forma atraer un mayor flujo de clientes interesados en sus creaciones.
texts.en: Elvira is separated and lives alone. She has a piñata and semi-used clothing business. Her priority so far have been her customers. She likes to serve them in a very special way because they have very different tastes. She has in mind making her business grow via buying a larger quantity of raw materials to make other types of piñatas different from the ones she already has to attract a larger flow of customers interested in her creations.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for piñatas.

loans.name: Gandiimaa

texts.en:
Gandiimaa is 23 years old and lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband works at a grocery store and her children stay at home. Gandiimaa is experienced in farming and organic milk production, since her parents are farmers as well and she works with the family business. Gandiimaa she loves her job, because she has been raising livestock since her childhood. With her integrity and hard work, she has gained number of regular customers. Currently, Gandiimaa has a 10 cows and calves in a suburban area of the city and her husband sells their organic milk to local residents. 

Gandiimaa is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT loan to purchase organic forage for her livestock. Her loan will increase her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase organic forage for livestock

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is a 35-year-old married man with five children, aged 4 to 12.  

He is in the cattle-fattening business of buying young cows and feeding them well, to in turn sell them at a later date for a profit. Alongside herding his animals, he also milks them and sells the milk. 

This hardworking man has been doing this since he was young.  As any farmer knows, his biggest challenges are weather dependent, and the dry season is tough, as the grass and water are not as plentiful for his cows.  

Still, this is his profession, and he dreams of having even more cows. He says he actually wants hundreds of them!  Emmanuel will use this loan of 3,000,000 UGX to buy more young cows.

loans.use: to buy more young cows.

loans.name: Jean Baptiste

texts.en:
Jean Baptiste is 28 years old and he is single. Jean Baptiste sells various goods such as: eggs, cakes, juice, water etc. He has two years of experience in this work. 

Jean Baptiste has requested a Kiva loan, via Vision Finance Company, in order to buy various goods such as: eggs, cakes, juice, water etc for resale. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as: eggs, cakes, juice, water etc for resale.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 34 year old married woman. She has 5 children, ages ranging from 5 years to 15 years. She describes herself to be a confident woman. She operates a grocery store where she sells vegetables such as onions, tomatoes, oranges, peas etc. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located within a competitive market and her primary customers are local consumers. 

Rose describes her biggest business challenge to be high prices of vegetables and insufficient funds for restocking. She will use the KES 8700 loan to purchase a water tank for her family's use. Her business goal is to expand her business ten times more within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will a great millionaire owning many business premises. Rose had taken a loan of KES 20,000, which she repaid well. She also does farming, which increases her daily income.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 35-year-old Kadiatu from Grassfield eastern area in Freetown. She is widowed with four children between the ages of 4 and 12 years old. Three of her children attend school. She took over her husband's business (who‘s now a late man) as next-of-kin.

Kadiatu runs an electronic spare parts shop. She sells headlight bulbs, brake pads, tires, batteries, alternators and metal rings. She has been running this business for five years. She works at the business every day, 11 hours per day. Her other source of income comes from a car rental service. Kadiatu says her business is doing fine.

Kadiatu has requested a loan in order to buy more electronic appliances and home theater. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her business. In the future, she plans to expand her business into a big electronics appliance store. She thanks you for your support!

video.title: Kiva Borrower Kadiatu from Sierra Leone

loans.use: to buy more electronic appliances and home theater.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: María es madre soltera, tiene 11 años con su negocio de abarrotes y esta vez le gustaría que se le apoye para invertir en su negocio para comprar  mas mercancia para satisfacer las necesidades de su comunidad y hacer frente a la competencia con productos de uso básico en el hogar y de esa manera aumentar el numero de clientes y por supuesto  mejorar las ventas y dar un mejor servicio. Con estas mejoras podrá así solventar los  gastos de su hija que tiene de12 años de edad y esta próxima su entrada a la secundaria.
texts.en: María is a single mother. She has had her grocery store business for 11 years. This time she would like your support to invest in her business to buy more merchandise to fulfill the needs of her community and face the competition. She will buy basic products for use in the home and in this way increase the number pf customers and of course improve her sales and give better service. With these improvements she will be able to pay for her daughter's expenses. She is 12 years old and about to start secundary school.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Estela Guadalupe

texts.es: Estela mujer casada, un hijo, emprendedora y sobretodo dedicada al esfuerzo de salir adelante por su propio trabajo. Ella atiende un negocio de ciber café desde ya hace mas de seis años ella asegura sentirse orgullosa de aun estar atendiendo el negocio que afortunadamente le va muy bien y en este momento solo piensa en la mejora del establecimiento para ofrecer un mejor servicio por la alta demanda. Quiere comprar monitores modernos ya que los que tiene estan algunos fallando y otros ya tienen mucho tiempo.
texts.en: Estela is a married woman with one son.  She is very entreprenuerial and above all dedicated to the effort of getting ahead by means of her own work.  She has been managing a cyber café business for more than six years.  She asserts that she feels proud to continue managing the business which fortunately has been going very well.  At this time she is focused on improving the establishment in order to offer better service because of the high demand.  She wants to purchase modern monitors since some of the ones that she has are failing and others are already quite old.

loans.use: To purchase monitors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Godenese

texts.en:
Godenese is 29 years old and married. He has one child. He sells various goods such as beans, Irish potatoes, rice, bread, etc. He has been in this business for one year, working from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m. every weekday.

Godenese has requested a Kiva loan, via Vision Finance Company, in order to buy more beans, Irish potatoes, rice, bread, etc. for resale. With the profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to increase his business by buying more beans, Irish potatoes, rice, bread, etc.

loans.name: Juan Fidencio

texts.es: Juan es una persona casada actualmente con tres hijos los cuales, dos están en la primaria y uno en secundaria y es por que el desea terminar la fachada exterior de su casa, con el proposito de ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a  sus hijos. El señor Juan tiene aproximadamente mas de ocho años trabajando para una misma empresa lo cual refleja que es una persona estable y comprometida con su trabajo, por esa razon el apoyo que se le de, lo va aprovechar de la mejor manera en su vivienda.
texts.en: Juan is currently a married person with three children, two of whom are in elementary school and one is in middle school.  It is for this that he wants to finish the exterior façade of his house, with the purpose of providing a better quality of life for his children.  Juan has worked approximately for more than eight years for the same company which reflects that he is a stable and committed person to his work; for that reason he will make the most of the support given to him in the best way in his home.

loans.use: to finish the exterior of his house.

loans.name: Oriol

texts.es: El Sr. Oriol tiene 58 años y tiene 5 hijos ya son todos independientes,  se dedica a la venta de variedad de artículos de primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio que se encuentra en la misma zona donde vive,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Oriol  va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de productos para surtir su negocio como abarrotes y refrescos  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, el Sr. Oriol va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener un almacén y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela. El Sr. Oriol es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada en la otorgación del crédito ya que esta es la única actividad con la que mantiene a su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Oriol is 58 years old and has five sons who are all independent. He works selling a variety of basic needs products in his neighborhood store that is found in the same zone where he lives.  This loan is his first sequence with the lending institution.  Mr. Oriol is going to use this loan to purchase a variety of products in order to supply his business such as groceries and soft drinks.  In this way he will offer a variety of products to his customers.  His reason for requesting this loan is to continue improving his business.  Mr. Oriol is going to use the earnings in order to continue buying products and thereby improve his income.  His desire for the business is to have a warehouse and thus provide better services for his customers.  Mr. Oriol is a very hard-working person who feels happy for the opportunity offered through this credit since his business is the only activity by which he supports his family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries and soft drinks

loans.name: Olivia

texts.es: La Sra. Olivia tiene 50 años y es soltera con 2  hijos que son de las edades de 25 y 23 años, ella se dedica a la   elaboración de helados de canela que se encuentran en una zona muy populosa de ciudad de La paz, los helados lo realiza de manera artesanal y es un alimento típico tradicional de la ciudad de La Paz, la Sra. Olivia es cliente  antigua ya que este  préstamo es el 8 que ha tomado con la institución, La Sra. Olivia va a usar este préstamo para la compra de azúcar y esencias para su negocio, la Sra. Olivia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la  competencia ya que debe haber unas 20 vendedoras en el mismo lugar pero lo que le diferencia a la Sra.  Olivia es el buen trato que da a sus clientes ya que es una persona muy amable y alegre y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir prosperando en su negocio.
texts.en: Ms. Olivia is 50 years old and is single with two sons who are 25 and 23 years old.  She works making cinnamon ice cream which can be found in a very populated zone in the city of La Paz.  She makes the ice cream in an artesanal fashion and it is a typical and traditional food from the city of La Paz.  Ms. Olivia is an experienced client since this is the 8th loan that she has taken with the lending institution.  Ms. Olivia is going to use this loan to purchase sugar and essences for her business.  Ms. Olivia faces challenges in her business which include competition since there must be some 20 vendors in the same area where she works, but what differentiates Ms. Olivia is the good treatment that she gives to her customers since she is a very nice and happy person.  She is going to use the loan in order to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of sugar and essences

loans.name: Miriame Plus Group

texts.en:
Maya is the chairwoman of a Community bank named “Miriame Plus”. This group is composed of 13 microentrepreneurs, united in solidarity to receive loans from Kiva through the MFI HOPE DRC, with the goal of developing their businesses. 

Maya, aged 50, is married and has two children. She sells pairs of slippers and wicks in the north western area of Kinshasa. She has been in business since 2000. She has acquired solid experience and her business has prospered, thanks to good management and accumulated profits. She is a loyal client who has already received the MFI HOPE DRC loans two times and repaid them properly. She intends, with the next loan, to purchase more pairs of shoes and some wicks to increase the inventory of her business. Her plan is to resell these items in order to increase her income. Currently, she earns a profit of US$100 every week.

loans.use: to purchase more pairs of slippers in bulk for resale.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Feliz Ignacio

texts.es: Don Felix de 50 años de edad, habitante de comarca La Tigra, labora en su unidad de produccion realizando actividades agricolas y pecuarias, las cuales se convierten en su principal fuente de ingreso para el bienestar de su familia, trabaja en conjunto con su esposa y sus hijos mayores, necesita este financiamiento para invertirlo en compra vaquillas actividad que le permitirá incrementar su inventario ganadero y mejorar sus fuente de ingreso cuando le esten produciendo leche, referencias lo consideran como un hombre trabajador, responsable y con muchos deseos de superacion.
texts.en: Don Felix is 50 years old and lives in the region of La Tigra.  He works in his fields with livestock and agricultural activities, which are his principle source of income and well-being for his family.  He works together with his wife and his older sons.  He needs this loan in order to invest in purchasing heifers, which will allow him to increase his livestock inventory and improve his source of income when they produce milk.  References consider him a hard-working and responsible man, with a great desire for success.

loans.use: To purchase heifers

loans.name: Angelica Araceli

texts.es: Angélica continua con su venta de productos de belleza por catálogo el cual empezó hace 6 años cuando dejo de laborar para una empresa, con el dinero de la liquidación que recibió se inscribió en la compañía e invirtió el dinero en la compra de productos. Por lo general es ella quien realiza los recorridos para la venta visitando a posibles clientes, entre los productos que mas venta tienen están los perfumes, maquillaje, cremas, desodorante, productos faciales. Le gusta el negocio porque si le deja ganancias y como está soltera cubre sus gastos sin problemas. Espera poder conseguir el crédito ya que es el primero que solicita porque desea comprar mercadería para tener en stock. A futuro espera seguir manteniendo su negocio para poder realizarse algunos arreglos a su casa y abrir un local para ofertar mejor sus productos.
texts.en: Angélica continues to sell beauty products via catalog, which she began six years ago when she stopped working for a company.  With the money from the liquidation that she received she signed onto the beauty company and invested the money in the purchase of products.  Generally she is the person who makes the rounds for sales, visiting possible clients.  Among her most popular products are perfumes, makeup, cremes, deodorant, and facial products.  She likes her business because it gives her income and since she is single it covers her expenses without problem.  She hopes to be able to obtain this loan since it is the first that she has requested and she wants to purchase merchandise in order to have things in stock.  In the future she hopes to continue running her business in order to make a few home improvements and to open a small store in order to more effectively sell her products.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, makeup, cremes, deodorant, and facial products

loans.name: Hector Armando

texts.es: El sr. Héctor es una persona soltera y que vive con sus padres ya que el contribuye a las necesidades del hogar y las personales. El sr Héctor trabaja para una empresa de distribución de electricidad en la cual tiene laborando algunos años como empleado. Presenta la necesidad de realizarse unos estudios médicos en general, necesita saber su estado de salud por algunas complicaciones que ha venido presentando.
texts.en: Hector is single and lives with his parents. He contributes to housing costs as well as personal expenses. Hector works for an electrical distribution company. He has worked as an employee for this company for several years. Currently, he needs to have some general medical tests done. He has had some health complications and needs to learn about his health status.

loans.use: to pay for health tests.

loans.name: Muon

texts.en:
Muon, age 31, is a farmer of honor, living with her spouse and two young children in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province. All of her children still attend school and live under her care. She owns a few hectares of farmland on which she grows various kinds of seasonal crops for her income. Rice, beans and potatoes are her focus crops. She is fortunate to earn a decent income of 11,500 riels (KHR) each day. She has been farming for almost 13 years now.

Muon is now asking for a loan of 2,000,000 KHR to purchase bean seeds for growing and to pay laborers for tilling the land. In the future, she hopes to stabilize her finances and persist in helping her children with their education. She is very thankful to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to purchase bean seeds for growing and to pay laborers for tilling the land.

loans.name: Rosa Veronica

texts.es: Rosa a pesar de todas las pruebas que ha tenido en la vida a sus 26 años ha salido adelante con sus dos hijos, estas pruebas han fortalecido su carácter convirtiéndola en una mujer de negocios. El negocio de ella es la venta de comida rápida, con un horno de carbón ella prepara pescado asado y platanos, este negocio en un principio lo realizaba su esposo pero luego de su separación lo tomo a su cargo. Por lo general trabaja de lunes a domingos desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 11, solo trabaja en la mañana porque su punto de venta es el mercado de Playas y por lo general el movimiento ahí es en la mañana. Como es madre soltera espera poder obtener el crédito para la compra de víveres y pescado  que es lo que necesita para su venta esperando con el tiempo incrementar el negocio y su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Rosa, despite all of the tests that she has had in her life at 26 years old, has been able to get ahead along with her two children.  These tests have fortified her character, transforming her into a business woman.  Her business is the selling of fast food.  With a coal oven she prepares grilled fish and plantains.  Her husband worked in this business initially, but after their separation she took it under her charge.  In general she works from Monday to Sunday, 7am to 11am.  She only works in the mornings because her point of sale is the market of Playas and generally the activity there is in the morning.  Since she is a single mother she hopes to be able to obtain credit in order to purchase supplies and fish, which is what she needs for her sales.  She is hoping with time to grow the business and her capital through work.

loans.use: to buy fish and plantains.

loans.name: Elsy Jessenia

texts.es: Elsy inicio su venta de frutas por la oportunidad de tener frente a su domicilio una escuela, empezó vendiendo por la ventana de su domicilio helados y jugos poco a poco se dio cuenta que el sector si es comercial por lo que decidió arriesgarse y solicitar un préstamo. De eso han pasado ya 2 años y ahora tiene un pequeño puesto en donde vende batidos de toda clase de frutas y jugos, sus cliente más frecuentes son los estudiantes por lo trabaja únicamente en las mañanas. El trabajo lo realiza sola ya que solo tiene una licuadora con la prepara el batido dependiendo de la fruta que el cliente desee, el vaso de batido lo vende a $ 2.00 pero depende del ingrediente porque hay frutas que son caras lo que eleva el precio. Este es el segundo préstamo de Elsy espera con el comprar otra licuadora, una tostadora para vender tostadas de queso y mortadela, recipiente, vasos, frutas y leche los ingredientes que más utiliza. Espera en un futuro cercano comprar una vitrina industrial que le permita mantener frescos los productos y ubicar en un local su venta.
texts.en: Elsy began selling fruit because of the opportunity she saw in having a school located in front of her home. She started selling ice cream and juices from a window in her home, and little by little, she realized that she was running a business and decided to take a risk and apply for a loan. Two years have passed since then, and now Elsy has a small stand where she sells juices and milkshakes made from all kinds of fruit. Her most frequent clients are students, so she only works in the mornings. She works alone, and only has one blender with which to prepare made-to-order milkshakes from the fruits that her clients want. She sells milkshakes for $2.00, but the price may be higher because there are some fruits that are more expensive. This is Elsy's second loan, and she hopes to buy another blender, a toaster so she can sell toasted cheese and bologna sandwiches, a container, glasses, and the ingredients she uses most--fruits and milk. Elsy hopes that in the near future, she will be able to buy a glass case that will allow her to keep her ingredients fresh, and to move her business to a storefront.

loans.use: to purchase a blender and toaster.

loans.name: Marcelino Angel

texts.es: Marcelino aprendió la pastelería hace varios años por un amigo quien le enseño la actividad luego de esto decidió iniciar su propio negocio. En la actualidad tiene un local en su vivienda bien equipado para realizar el producto, como único ayudante lo tiene a su hijo con quien prepara el producto desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 8:00 y luego en la tarde desde las 16:00 hasta las 18:00  para su venta. En su panadería vende tortas, panes de dulce, sal, rellenos, empanada etc., toda clase de dulces para degustar. Marcelino piensa agrandar su negocio es por esto que solicita el crédito ya que comprara los ingredientes para la preparación como harina, levadura, manteca, sal y demás. Espera a futuro mejorar sus ingresos de tal manera que pueda pagar el  crédito y poder empezar la remodelación del local.
texts.en: Marcelino learned the baking trade several years ago from a friend. After learning about baking, he decided to start his own business. Marcelino has a place in his home that is well-equipped to make his products. His only helper is his son, with whom he prepares baked goods from 5:00 am until 8:00 am, and then works from 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm selling the goods. In his bakery, Marcelino sells cakes, sweet breads, salty bread, filled pastries, turnovers, etc.--all kinds of treats to enjoy. Marcelino is thinking of growing his business, and this is why he is applying for a loan. With the loan, he will buy ingredients such as flour, yeast, butter, salt, and more. In the future, Marcelino hopes to improve his income enough that he is able to pay back his loan and still be able to remodel his workspace.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, butter, and salt.

loans.name: Viviana Karina

texts.es: Viviana continua vendiendo productos de belleza y ropa por catalogo el cual había empezado varios años atrás pero solo cosméticos, con el paso del tiempo a incluido la ropa obteniendo mayores ventas. El negocio lo realiza sola ya que realiza recorridos por varios sectores de Libertad en busca de nuevos clientes, una de las ventajas que tiene es que los productos son conocidos lo que facilita su venta. Ella está solicitando el crédito para comprar mercadería y tener en stop una de las ventajas de hacer esto es porque se compra mercadería en promoción lo cual las hace mas económicas y al llevarlas de muestra facilita mas su venta. La que comprara es lo que más vende por ejemplo maquillaje, sombras, labiales, cremas, perfumes, pantalones, blusas, etc., espera que con esto su negocio siga creciendo lento pero seguro.
texts.en: Viviana still sells beauty products and clothing from a catalogue, an activity which she had started several years ago, although she only sold cosmetics. Over time she has had better sales by including clothing. She runs her business by herself since she makes runs through different sections of Libertad looking for new clients. One of the advantages she has is that the products she sells are well-known, which makes it easier to make sales. She is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise and to have stock. One of the advantages of doing this is that when she purchases merchandise on sale, it is more economical for her. Additionally, having it for samples makes it easier to sell. She will purchase the items she sells the most, for example, make-up, eye shadow, lipstick, creams, perfume, slacks, and blouses, etc. She hopes that the loan will help her business continue to grow, slowly but surely.

loans.use: to purchase make-up, eye shadow, lipstick, creams, perfume, slacks, and blouses.

loans.name: Gerson Newman

texts.es:
Gerson es un hombre muy trabajador, entusiasta y alegre, él vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona, tiene 2 pequeños hijos quienes son su razón principal para esforzarse y Salir adelante; lamentablemente por diversas razones se separó de su esposo, desde entonces él es padre y madre para sus pequeños; con mucho empeño culminó sus estudios secundarios, pero por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo cursar estudios superiores, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Metalúrgica.  
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, desde hace 3 años Gerson trabaja como obrero en una mina de su ciudad, día a día desde tempranas horas de la mañana asiste a su centro de labores, él trabaja un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y se siente a gusto realizando su labor ya que sus jefes lo consideran mucho por su buen desempeño y por su trato amable hacia los demás.
Gerson se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá iniciar la construcción de su vivienda, ya que actualmente su hogar esta hecho de  adobes y esteras; de esta manera Gerson tendrá su hogar construido con materiales adecuados los cuales brinden mayor seguridad y bienestar para sus pequeños, así él espera poder seguir trabajando para asegurar la educación y futuro de sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Gerson is a very hard-working man, enthusiastic and happy. He lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Parcona. He has two little children who are his principal reason for striving and advancing. Unfortunately, for various reasons he separated from his wife. Since then, he is father and mother to his little ones. With much effort, he completed his secondary studies, but because of the need to work and pay his expenses, he was not able to study at a higher level. But he would have liked to study metallurgical engineering.

With great effort and enthusiasm, Gerson has worked as a laborer in a mine in his city for three years. Day after day, from the early hours of the morning, he is at his work center. He works about 10 hours a day, and he feels comfortable doing his work, since his bosses think a lot of him because of his good efforts and his friendly treatment of others.

Gerson is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help offered to him he will be able to begin construction of his house, since now his house is made of adobe and mats. This way, Gerson will have a house constructed of suitable materials that will offer better security and well-being for his little ones. Thus he hopes to be able to continue working to assure the education and future of his little children.

loans.use: to begin the construction of his house.

loans.name: Ester Beatriz

texts.es:
Doña Ester sigue vendiendo una variedad de platillos de comida rápida en su cafetín, también cuenta con la entrada de ingreso de un cuarto de alquiler, el cual se ayuda para solventar sus gastos, es madre soltera, de tres hijos casados, el cual apoyo con sus estudios. También ellos la apoyan  con los gastos.
Hoy con este nuevo préstamo, iniciara la construcción de un local de segundo piso, el cual ira poco a poco, hasta terminar, esto con el fin de poner su cafetín en el segundo piso, para la captación de más clientes, al tener visibilidad, ya que anteriormente ocupada parte  de cocina. Y ahora hará esta mejora siendo posible gracias a los créditos otorgados en Afodenic las mejoras a su vivienda y a su pequeño negocio.
Materiales a comprar: bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, tablas, estribos, y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Ester continues selling a variety of fast food in her small café.  She also earns income by renting out a room which helps to cover her expenses.  She is a single mother of three children who are all married. She supports them in their education and they also assist her with the expenses. 

With this new loan, she will begin construction of a second floor which she will work on little by little until completion.  Her goal is to move her café to the second floor to attract more customers due to greater visibility. Previously, her café was located in part of her kitchen.  And now these improvements to her home and her small business will be possible thanks to the loan granted by Afodenic.

Supplies to buy: bricks, sand, cement, iron, boards, and support to start working.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a second floor to relocate her cafe.

loans.name: Tengiz

texts.en:
Tengiz is 41 years old. He lives in Tkibuli District with wife, Ksenia, and their three children (6, 6 and 15 years old). All three go to the local school. Tengiz is busy with a small scale agricultural business. He has requested loans from local financial institutions several times for agricultural business start-up, but without any success. His loan requests were rejected all the time because of his low income and his family’s poor living conditions. 

The only source of the income for the family is monthly income from their agricultural business. They have a vineyard and a plot of land where nut trees are grown. They sell nuts and wine at the local open market. The average monthly income of the family is 350 laris. It is hardly enough for food for a five member family. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the vulnerable poor category.

Tengiz requested a loan from Credo to start up a new type of business. His loan request was approved in the framework of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor, who do not have access to credit products being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. 

With the received credit, Tengiz plans to open a bakery in his house. He will purchase necessary equipment (stove and dishes) and will start baking bread and candy products which will be sold in the village. This new business initiative, financed with a Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the income of the family. Their income will double and the family members will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for his bakery

loans.name: Marizabel Mireya

texts.es: Merizabel empezó su vida en el comercio hace 6 años atrás con la ayuda de su hermano quien le dio el capital inicial, a medida que iba pasando el tiempo el negocio fue creciendo hasta el día de hoy. Ahora tiene una tienda de abarrotes en el Fortín donde vive muy surtida en la cual ofrece variedad de productos como arroz, azucar, viveres etc. El negocio no la maneja sola ya que su esposo le ayuda en la venta o recorre los sectores vendiendo mercadería. Como tiene 4 hijos siempre hay alguien dispuesto ayudarle luego de llegar de los colegios. Como desea mejorar su vivienda ella necesita un poco de capital de trabajo para comprar mercadería logrando que sus ventas aumenten, es por ese motivo que solicita el préstamo.
texts.en: Marizabel started life as a businesswoman 6 years ago, after her brother helped by giving her the initial capital to start her business. As time passed, the business has grown from then until today. Now Marizabel has a small grocery store in the Fortín neighborhood where she lives. Her store is well-stocked and offers a variety of products such as rice, sugar, and other staple foods. Marizabel does not manage the store alone, because her husband helps her either in the store or by traveling to different areas to sell merchandise. Because she has 4 children, there is always someone available to help her after they come home from school. Marizabel needs some working capital to be able to purchase merchandise, so that she will be able to increase her sales and improve her home. For this reason, she is asking for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as rice, sugar, and other staple foods.

loans.name: Ricardo Elias

texts.es: Ricardo tiene un negocio poco común pero con buenos resultados, en su domicilio tiene un vivero donde el mismo cuida de sus plantas. Comenzó el negocio hace tiempo con un pequeño jardín, siempre le han gustado las plantas y cuando sus familiares le apoyaron inicio su negocio. Las plantas las comercializa por mayor o menor pero lo que más le gusta es cuidar de ellas por eso no lo considera un trabajo sino un pasatiempo. El negocio es familiar ya que están involucrados todos los miembros de su familia la cual es favorable ya que se tiene mayor cuidado. Uno de sus más grandes temores es que le caigan plagas a sus plantas y mueran ya que perdería el capital invertido. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de semillas, maceteros, palmas y adecuaciones que le quiere realizar al vivero para hacerlo más productivo. Su sueño es poder agrandar el negocio, abrir a futuro otro y poder generar mayores fuentes de ingresos.
texts.en: Ricardo has an uncommon business that yields good results. He has a nursery in his house where he himself tends to his plants. He began his business a while ago with a small garden. He has always enjoyed plants, and when his relatives helped him, he started his business. He sells his plants at both wholesale and retail prices. What he enjoys most is caring for the plants. As a result, it does not feel like work for him as much as a hobby. His is a family business since every member of his family is involved. This is beneficial since everything is cared for better. One of his greatest fears is that his plants will succumb to blight and die, which would cause him to lose the capital he has invested. He will invest the loan he is requesting by purchasing seeds, flower pots, and palms, as well as by making the improvements he wants to make to his nursery to make it more productive. His dream is to be able to expand his business, open another site in the future, and be able to generate greater sources of income.

loans.use: to purchase seed, flower pots, and palms, as well as to make improvements.

loans.name: Claudia Claribel

texts.es:
La señora Claudia tiene 32 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y  cuatro hijos  (dos varones de  17  y 15 años; dos niñas de  11  y 7  años respectivamente), en terrenos que le donó el estado en el que construyeron  una casa de adobe.

Ella Se dedica a prestar sus servicios como costura, desde hace 6 años, esta actividad la aprendió cuando trabajo como empleada domestica de una costurera de su comunidad.

 Actualmente, se está especializando en una academia de alta costura en la ciudad a la que asiste tres días a la semana en horarios de 8:00 a.m. a 3.00 p.m. Costura para personas de la comunidad, actualmente posee una sociedad con otras dos costureras y realizan uniformes escolares para 5  centros escolares de la ciudad. 

Las materias primas las adquiere en la ciudad, ubicada a 7 kilómetros de su casa, los que normalmente recorre por calles balastreadas en pick up que transportan personas, debido al mal servicio de transporte colectivo en la zona. Sus compras son de contado y las realiza normalmente una vez por mes, donde compra cantidades suficientes que le permiten obtener un menor precio de compra.

El préstamo será invertido en la compra de una maquina de costura semi-industrial. Con la adquisición de la maquina, podrá mejorar eficiencia y calidad en sus labores. Esto le permitirá mejorar su rentabilidad y preferencia de parte de sus clientes.

Claudia desea que sus hijos aprendan el oficio  de alta costura y con el apoyo de ellos iniciar un taller, con una bonita sala de atención en la ciudad.
texts.en:
Claudia is 32 years old and married. She lives with her husband and four children (two boys who are 17 and 15 years old, and two girls who are 11 and 7 years old) on land donated by the government where they have built an adobe house.

She has worked providing sewing services for six years. She learned this trade when she worked as a domestic employee for a seamstress in her community.

Currently, she is honing her skills at a high fashion academy in the city, which she attends three days a week from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. She sews for people in the community; currently, she owns a company with two other seamstresses, and they make school uniforms for five schools in the city.

She gets her raw materials in the city, located seven kilometers from her house; she normally makes the trip on gravel roads in a truck that transports people, due to the poor bus service in the area. Her purchases are made in cash, normally once a month, when she buys enough to allow her to get a lower price.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of a semi-industrial sewing machine. With the acquisition of the machine, she will be able to improve the efficiency and quality of her work. This will allow her to improve her profitability and her customer appeal.

Claudia wants her children to learn the high fashion trade; with their support, she will start a workshop with a pretty showroom in the city.

loans.use: to purchase a semi-industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Bismarck Antonio

texts.es:
El joven Bismarck de 20 años de edad,habitante de Comarca, La Tigra,  desde su pequeñes se ha dedicado al trabajo del campo, realizando actividades agricolas y pecuarias, las cuales se conforman en su pricipal fuente de ingreso, trabaja en conjunto con su papá en su unidad de produccion, es un joven activo sus vecinos y amigos lo consideran como una persona  trabajadora, emprendedora, responsable y de buenas culturas y ha heredado de sus padres sus conocimientos en la labor que desempeña a diario. 
Nesecita este financiamiento para invertirlo en compra de vaquillas, esperando incrementar su hato ganadero para el fortalecimiento de su economia que es su mayor meta.
texts.en:
The young Bismarck is 20 years old and lives in Comarca, La Tigra. Since he was little, he has done field work, carrying out agricultural and livestock-related tasks, which are his principal source of income. He works with his father on his farm. He is an active youth. His neighbors and friends consider him a hard-working, entrepreneurial, responsible, and well brought up person, and he has inherited from his parents his knowledge of the work that he performs every day.

He needs this financing to invest in the purchase of heifers, hoping to increase his livestock herd to strengthen his economic position, which is his major goal.

loans.use: to buy heifers

loans.name: Javier Jhoovany

texts.es: El joven Javier tiene 29 años y es soltero, el se dedica a la  compra y venta de movilidades en distintos lugares donde hay auto ventas,  este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución,  Javier va a usar este préstamo  para pago de impuestos y mantenimiento en general para las movilidades de su negocio. su razón para solicitar este préstamo es acondicionamiento de las  movilidades para ponerlas a la venta, Javier enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la fuerte competencia y poca demanda,  el va a utilizar los beneficios incremento de capital y su deseo es comprar  una casa, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es su única actividad con la que se mantiene y ayuda a su mama y a sus hermanos.
texts.en:
The young man Javier is 29 years old and single. He makes a living buying and selling vehicles in several places where there are car sales. This loan is his third loan cycle with the institution. Javier is going to use this loan to pay the fees and general maintenance for his business' automobiles. His reason for requesting this loan is to prepare the vehicles to put them up for sale. 

Javier faces challenges in his business because of strong competition and little demand. He is going to use his profits to increase his capital. His wish is to buy a house and be happy and thankful for the opportunity that is brought to him since this is the only work with which he can provide for and help his mother and siblings.

loans.use: to pay fees and general maintenance.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is the father of three children with the first two already schooling and the last born only aged six months. His farm produce includes cabbages, milk, yams, and tea, which he sells to the local market. He is a mansion.

David has requested a loan of 36,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He plans to use the extra income to expand his dairy farming business as well as purchase more land. His focus, however, is to give better education to his children and improve the family's living standards through provision of basic needs.

David says the hostile weather conditions remain the major challenge.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Maria Fatima

texts.es: La Sra. María tiene 33 años y es casada tiene 2  hijos que son de las edades de 19 y 9 años, ella se dedica a la   venta de lubricantes para movilidades en su tienda que se encuentra en la zona de Villa Mercedes de la ciudad de Santa cruz, la Sra. María es cliente  antigua ya que este  préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. María va a usar este préstamo para la compra de lubricantes por mayor  para su negocio, la Sra. María enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la  competencia ya que existen varias vendedoras en el mismo lugar pero lo que le diferencia a la Sra.  María es el buen trato que da a sus clientes ya que es una persona muy amable y alegre y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir prosperando en su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora María is 33 years old and is married.  She has two children who are ages 19 and 9.  She makes a living in the sale of lubricants for vehicles in her store that is located in the Villa Mercedes area of the city of Santa Cruz.  María is former client as this loan is her third in a sequence with the organization.  

María is going to use this loan for the purchase of wholesale lubricants for her business.  María faces challenges in her business such as competition as there are several sellers in the same area but what distinguishes María is the good treatment that she gives her customers since she is a very kind and happy person. She is going to use the profits to continue to prosper in her business.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale lubricants.

loans.name: Ignacio Alejandro

texts.es: El sr. Ignacio es padre de familia de tres hijas maravillosas y tiene su propio negocio de albañilería realizando trabajos en diferentes lugares, el ingreso no es fijo ya que a veces puede haber mas o puede haber menos trabajo, es muy difícil cuando alguien tiene a cargo a una familia completa y no tiene un sueldo fijo pero el señor Ignacio es un hombre muy trabajador que se recomienda por si solo ya que el trabajo que realiza lo hace lo mejor posible y nunca lo ha dejado a medias, es lo que ha ayudado de esta manera a ganarse la confianza de los que lo contratan y así mismo el sustento para su familia.
