Gracias a la experiencia que tiene en la crianza de los animales, puede gozar de muy buenos clientes que le permiten tener muy buenas ventas, pero debido a las dificultades económicas que atraviesa su familia, busca mejores ingresos para poder seguir estudiando. Para responder a unos grandes pedidos que tiene de unos clientes, Nélida busca un préstamo que le permita comprar pollos y adecuar el corral para su cuidado y tener con qué responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es seguir saliendo adelante con este negocio y que le permita salir adelante con sus estudios universitarios. Además, espera poder seguir contribuyendo a sus padres para que puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nélida, 22, is a young entrepreneur who in order to be able to access university studies has her own business raising cattle and chickens.  She learned this activity from her parents who are in this business and she’s helped them with it since she was very young until she decided to have her own animals to be able to pay for her studies.  

Thanks to the experience she has raising animals, she’s able to have very good customers that lead to very good sales but because of the economic difficulties her family is going through she’s looking for ways to generate improved income to be able to continue studying.  To respond to some large pending customer orders, Nélida is looking for a loan to buy chicks and to equip the corral for their care so that she can respond to customer orders.  Her greatest dream is to continue moving forward with this business so that she can continue getting ahead with her university studies.  In addition, she hopes to be able to continue contributing to her parents so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chicks and repair corrals.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
El Sr Marcelino casado, tiene 6 hijos dependientes de los cuales 3 estudian, la familia vive en una comunidad rural lejana a 21 km hacia el norte de Colomi 2da Candelaria Central Kury Mayu.
Don Marcelino, son agricultores que perciben ingresos estacionales dentro del año de la venta de papa, haba, oca, papaliza, cuentan con cabezas de ganado vacuno 3 de engorde, 1 lechera mas 1 ternero, Es así que logra mantener a su familia económicamente y a sus hijos que sigan estudiando hasta salir profesionales y que tengan un futuro mejor que él. El Sr. Marcelino a solicitando préstamo, para comprar terreno agrícola, nos cuentan que tienen un pequeño ahorro de dinero y necesita un para aumentar, finalmente se quedaron muy satisfechos por haber tenido esta oportunidad que en otros Bancos les pidieron muchos requisitos además con esto mas mejorara seguridad alimentaria para todos sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marcelino is married and has six dependent children three of which are attending school.  The family lives in a rural community 21 kilometers north of Colomi 2da Candelaria Central, Kury Mayu.

Marcelino and his wife are farmers and earn seasonal income throughout the year selling potatoes, lima beans, oca [a tuber], and ‘papaliza’ [type of potato].  They own three head of cattle, one dairy cow and one calf.  This is how he manages to support his family economically and keep his children in school so that they can become professionals and have a better future than he’s had.

Marcelino is asking for a loan to buy farmland.  He relates that they have a little bit of money saved and needs to add to it.  In the end, they were very satisfied for having this opportunity because other banks asked for too many requirements.  With this, he will be able to better insure his children’s food supply.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Veronica Cristina

texts.es: Veronica tiene 19 años y vive en Libertad, sector turístico de Ecuador reconocido por sus playas y gastronomía. Ella es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora, parte de este empuje se lo debe a su hijo quien tiene un añito, al ser madre soltera muy joven busco la manera de salir adelante y poderle brindar un futuro a su hijo. De esta manera y con un capital que logro reunir empezó la venta de gorras y gafas de manera ambulante recorriendo diversos sectores todo el día, poco a poco y gracias a las autoridades pudo alquilar un puesto en la zona regenerada de la ciudad donde instalar su negocio, este echo a logrado elevar su proposito de seguir adelante para cumplir sus metas. Con el crédito que está solicitando espera comprar bolsos, gafas, gorras para tener en stock y así brindar variedad. Su sueño a futuro es tener un negocio mas grande con un ayudante para dedicarle más tiempo a su hijo.
texts.en: Veronica is 19 years old and she lives in Libertad, a tourist area of Ecuador known for its beaches and gastronomy.  Though she is young, she is an enterprising and hardworking woman.  Part of her motivation is her son, who is only one year old.  Upon becoming a single mother so young, she sought out a way to get ahead and be able to offer her son a future.  This is how, with the capital she was able to put together, she began selling baseball caps and glasses on foot, covering different neighborhoods all day long.  Little by little, thanks to the authorities, she was able to rent a stall to set up her business in the regenerated area of the city.  This allowed her to raise her goal of getting ahead to fulfill her aims.  She plans to use the loan she requested to buy purses, glasses, and baseball caps to have stock and be able to offer variety.  Her dream for the future is to have a bigger business with an assistant so she can spend more time with her son.

loans.use: to buy purses, glasses, and baseball caps

loans.name: Jaqueline

texts.es:
Jaqueline es una joven trabajadora que desde muy joven comenzó a trabajar con artículos de sonido en un almacén y donde adquirió una gran experiencia. Gracias a esto, un día decidió montar su propio almacén donde ofrece productos de sonido como parlante, pasacintas, paneles, bajos, entre otros, y de esta manera genera los ingresos con los cuales sostiene sus propios gastos y contribuye económicamente para que en su hogar tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Con 22 años, Jaqueline ha logrado progresar y en su negocio tiene muy buenos clientes, lo que le permite tener unas ventas que cada vez vienen creciendo. Jaqueline busca un préstamo que le permita comprar algunos artículos de sonido que se han venido agotando en su negocio.

Su sueño es sacar adelante este negocio y que le permita tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto a ella como a sus padres, y además de esto aspira en que algún día logre comprar su casa propia para que sus padres también tengan el hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Jaqueline is a hard-working young adult who started to work with audio products in a store when she was very young.  She acquired a lot of experience there.  Thanks to this, one day she decided to set up her own store where she offers audio products like speakers, cassette players, panels and basses among other things.  In this way she will generate the income with which she sustains her own expenses and contributes economically so her family will have a better quality of life.  At 22 years old, Jaqueline has achieved progress, and she has very good clients in her business, which permits her to have sales that keep growing.  Jaqueline is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy some audio products that have been selling out in her business.

Her dream is for her business to progress and permit her to have a better quality of life, as much for her as for her parents.  Also, from this she hopes that one day she will be able to buy her own house so her parents will also have a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy some audio products that have been selling out in her business

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba tiene un restaurante el cual aprendió a trabajar gracias a que es un negocio que viene de familia, pues su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y trabajando a su lado Rosalba logró aprender la actividad. Casada y con 2 hijos de 14 y 12 años de edad, Rosalba aporta económicamente junto con su esposo para que en su hogar puedan tener una buena calidad de vida y brindarles a sus 2 hijos el acceso a una educación de buena calidad. Desde hace un tiempo que tiene su restaurante, Rosalba ha venido trabajando fuertemente, y a pesar de que cuando lo montó contaba solo con algunos implementos básicos, ahora las buenas ventas que tiene le han exigido hacer crecer su negocio poco a poco. Debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente, pues tiene ahorrada aproximadamente la mitad del dinero, Rosalba busca un préstamo para comprar una nevera panorámica donde pueda conservar todo los alimentos de su restaurante.

Su sueño es que su negocio salga adelante y lograr comprar el local donde tiene ubicado su restaurante. Además, aspira que en su hogar salgan adelante y puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Rosalba has a restaurant which she learned to work in, thanks to that it is a family business.  Her father worked in this business and working by his side, Rosalba was able to learn the business.  Married and with two children of 14 and 12 years of age, Rosalba supports the family economically along with her husband so that in her home they can have a good quality of life and offer their two children access to a high quality education.  Since she has had her restaurant, Rosalba has been working hard. In spite of that when she set it up she only had some basic implements, now the good sales that they have have demanded that she make her business grow bit by bit.  Due to that she doesn't have sufficient capital, now she has saved approximately half of the money.  Rosalba is looking for a loan to buy a refrigerated display case that can conserve all of her restaurant's food.

Her dream is that her business gets ahead and to be able to buy the location where her restaurant is located.  Also, she hopes that she can get ahead in her home and she and her family can have a better quality of life and better economic opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerated display case where she can conserve all of her restaurant's food

loans.name: Maria Doris

texts.es:
Maria es madre soltera cabeza de hogar de sus 3 hijos a quienes busca brindarles el acceso a una educación de buena calidad; para esto trabaja fuertemente todos los días en la tienda general que inició con el ánimo de poder generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar y lograr salir adelante. Desde que montó su tienda las condiciones económicas en su hogar han mejorado considerablemente y esto le ha permitido brindarles a sus 3 hijos mejores oportunidades para salir adelante y una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que no cuenta con mucho capital, Maria acude a un préstamo para comprar una nevera ya que la que esta en su tienda ya se dañó.

Su sueño es salir adelante con este negocio y hacerlo crecer para que su situación económica mejore considerablemente y sus hijos puedan tener la oportunidad en un futuro de asistir a la universidad.
texts.en:
Maria is a a single mother, head of a household of 3 children.  She looks to offer them access to a high quality education.  For this she works hard everyday in the general store that she enthusiastically started to be able to generate the income that is required in her home and be able to get ahead.  Since she set up her store the economic conditions in her home have improved considerably and this has allowed her to offer her children better opportunities to get ahead and a better quality of life.  Because she doesn't have much capital, Maria turns to a loan to be able to buy a refrigerator since the one that is in her store is damaged.

Her dream is to get ahead in this business and make it grow so her economic situation improves considerably and her children can have the opportunity to attend the university in the future.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, since the one in her store is damaged

loans.name: Miryam Amparo

texts.es:
Miryam es madre soltera cabeza de familia y desde que tuvo su primer hijo vio la necesidad de comenzar a trabajar, y fue así cuando empezó a trabajar en salas de belleza y le gusto mucho esta actividad. Ya teniendo el conocimiento y la experiencia, inició su propio salón de belleza. Miryam ha superado con una gran fortaleza las duras adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, pues el hecho de ser madre soltera de sus 2 hijos, tenerles que brindar una educación de buena calidad, y sostener los gastos de su hogar, han hecho que se tenga que esforzar fuertemente todos los días en su trabajo para poder salir adelante. Miryam desea seguir creciendo en su negocio y desde poder comprar los artículos de barbería que necesita para que su hijo menor comience a trabajar a su lado, ya que durante un tiempo estudió la profesión. Pero debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para esto, Miryam busca un préstamo para comprar las herramientas necesarias para ofrecer el servicio de barbería en su salón de belleza.

Su sueño es poder salir adelante y superar estas duras pruebas que le ha presentado la vida. Además, aspira a que en un futuro pueda comprar su casa propia y así tener la oportunidad de ofrecerles a sus hijos un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Miryam’s a single mother head of household.  When she had her first child she realized the need to start working and this is how she started working in beauty shops.  She liked it very much.  Once she had acquired knowledge and experience, she opened her own beauty shop.

Miryam has overcome life’s adversities with much strength because being a single mother of two children and having to provide them with a good quality education and cover household expenses has caused her to strive hard every day at work in order to get ahead.  Miryam wants to continue growing in her business and would like to buy barbering supplies so that her younger son can start working alongside her since he’s been studying the profession for some time now.  Because she does not have sufficient capital to do so, Miryam is looking for a loan to buy the necessary tools to provide barbering services in her beauty salon.

Her dream is to be able to move forward and overcome the tough challenges life has presented her with.  In addition, she hopes in the future to be able to buy her own house thus being able to provide her children with a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy beauty salon supplies.

loans.name: Griselda Ilmer

texts.es:
La Señora Griselda, es socia del banco comunal “Nuevo Edén”. Distrito Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 33 años, está casada y tiene dos hijos menores.
Su negocio lo inició con S/. 300.00 nuevos soles que fue su primer préstamo y vendía golosinas en la esquina de la plaza de su distrito, luego se propuso y compró un terreno y ahora tiene su propio negocio en su casa, ella se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, agua mineral y cervezas, más adelante desea tener una gran distribuidora.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprara: 35 cajas de cerveza, 5 cajas La de gaseosas personales, 2 paquetes de agua mineral.
Con mucho trabajo está logrando sus metas para mejorar la situación económica de toda su familia, agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda económica prestada para poder iniciar su negocio y de esa manera poder contribuir en su hogar
texts.en:
Griselda is a member of the Nuevo Edén Communal Bank in the district of Yarinacocha, Ucayali Department.  She is 33 years old, married, and she has two young children.

She started her business with 300 nuevos soles, which was her first loan, and she sold candy on the corner of her district's main square.  She then set out to buy some land, and she now has her own business in her home.  She sells soft drinks, mineral water, and beer.  In the future, she would like to have a large distributor.  

With her new loan of 1,700 nuevos soles, she will buy 35 cases of beer, 5 cases of personal soft drinks, and 2 packs of mineral water.  

She is achieving her goals through a lot of work in order to improve her family's financial situation.  She is thankful to Manuela Ramos for the financial help she has been offered to be able to start her business and thereby contribute to her household.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, beer, and mineral water for resale

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly esta casada y no tiene hijos, vive en una casa en anticrético ocupando tres habitaciones, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Gran Poder de la ciudad de La Paz.
Ella estudió solo hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente trabaja como costurera junto a su esposo elaborando ropa de diferentes entidades militares y policiales trabajando por más de doce horas al día ya que debe cumplir con el pago de alquiler de su taller, alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para la compra de telas con cantidad y con el crédito logrará adquirir telas por mayor para posteriormente confeccionar y vender sus productos.
El sueño de Nelly es tener su casa propia y ampliar su taller de esta forma mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la primera junto a KIVA.
En la foto adjunta, Nelly aparece al lado de su esposo.
texts.en:
Nelly is married and has no children.  She lives in a rented house and occupies three rooms.  The house is located in the District of Gran Poder in the city of La Paz.

Nelly only has a high school education and currently works as a seamstress alongside her husband.  They produce clothes for the various armed forces and the police.  She works more than 12 hours a day so that she can pay the rent on her workshop, as well as food and basic services for her family.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy raw materials since does not earn enough to buy fabrics in quantity.  With the loan, Nelly will be able to buy fabrics in bulk for making and selling her products.  

Nelly dreams of having a house of her own and expanding her workshop so that she can improve her income and her quality of life.  This is the second time she has requested a loan from IMPRO, but the first time with Kiva.  In the photo, Nelly appears next to her husband.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: Florencia tiene 33 años de edad, vive en Bolivia en el Departamento de Cochabamba estudio hasta el nivel primario no pudo culminar sus estudios, no contaba con recursos económicos en su familia, es casada y no convive mucho con su marido ya que él viaja constantemente a Chile pero le ayuda con los gastos familiares, de lo cual tiene 3 pequeños hijos, uno de sus hijos estudia esta en el nivel básico y los otros dos son pequeños. Florencia se dedica a la comercialización por mayor y menor de frutillas y verduras, desde muy temprano de la mañana ella viaja a Pocona para traer su mercadería para su comercialización, durante su viaje les deja a sus hijos a cargo a su cuñada. El crédito que solicita es para capital de operación, ya que ella quiere crecer con su negocio de comercialización y así mejorar sus ingresos familiares y darles una mejor vida a sus pequeños  hijos.
texts.en:
Florencia, 33, lives in Bolivia in Cochabamba Department.  She attended primary school but was unable to complete her schooling because her family lacked the economic resources to do so.  She’s married but does not spend much time with her husband because he travels to Chile constantly but helps her with household expenses.  She has three small children.  One of them attends primary school and the other two are still too young.

Florencia sells fruit and vegetables at wholesale.  Starting very early in the morning she travels to Pocona to get merchandise to sell.  During her trip she leaves her children with her sister-in-law.

The loan she’s requesting is for operating capital since she wants to grow in her business and improve her family income to give her little children a better life.

loans.use: Capital de operación.

loans.name: Dilma

texts.es:
Doña Dilma, tiene 44 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, tiene 8 hijos, pero le acompañan solo 4 de ellos, vive en el municipio de las vegas Santa Bárbara.
Desde joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura, y hace 20 años que cultiva, hortalizas, bananos y vegetales. Ella aprovecha la zona que es apta para estos cultivos y la producción la vende en el mercado local. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, abonos para cultivar zanahoria, remolacha, cilantro fino y rábano. Ella espera sacar mejores cosechas con esta inversión ya que este cultivo necesita ser fertilizado. Su meta es continuar produciendo  para obtener ingresos que mejoren la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Dilma is 44 years old and single as a result of becoming a widow. She has eight children, but only four of them live with her. Dilma lives in the town of Las Vegas, Santa Bárbara.

From a young age, Dilma has engaged in agriculture. For the past 20 years, she has been growing greens, bananas, and vegetables. She takes advantage of this area since it is suitable for growing these products. Whatever she produces is sold at the local market.

The loan she is requesting is in the amount of 7,000 HNL and will be invested in the purchase of supplies, fertilizers, and compost for growing carrots, beets, fine cilantro, and radishes. She hopes to obtain a better harvest with this investment since her crops are in need of fertilizer. Her goal is to continue producing so that she can generate more income and improve the quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizers, and compost for her crops.

loans.name: Eustaquio Felipe

texts.es:
Eustaquio es un hombre de 53 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y su pequeño hijo;  él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo por salir adelante junto con su familia; lamentablemente por tener la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Civil, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programa educativos y noticieros en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y al apoyo de su familia, Eustaquio se desempeña en el rubro de la construcción, él es maestro de obras, desde tempranas horas de la mañana dedica un aproximado de 10 horas diarias a su labor, mensualmente puede atender un promedio de 5 clientes, él se encuentra a gusto realizando su trabajo. 
Eustaquio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales para sus obras, tales como: maderas, clavos, cubos, sogas, entre otros; de esta manera Eustaquio podrá contar con las herramientas necesarias para realizar su trabajo y con ello espera poder atender a mas clientes e incrementar su ingresos económicos, los cuales desea utilizar para asegurar la educación u bienestar de su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Eustaquio, 53, lives in the city of Ica with his spouse and young son.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who very much wants to get ahead with his family.  Unfortunately, because he needed to work and cover expenses he was unable to study a professional career but he would have liked to have studied civil engineering.  In his free time he enjoys watching informative programs and news on television and sometimes cooks a delicious “Ají de Gallina” to share with his family.

Thanks to his enterprising spirit and support from his family, Eustaquio works in construction. He’s a master builder and starting very early in the morning spends about 10 hours daily at work.  He can have an average of five customers per month.  He is happy doing his work.

Eustaquio is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy supplies like lumber, nails, buckets and rope, among others, for his work.  In this way, Eustaquio will have the necessary tools on hand to do his work and be able to tend to more customers thus increasing his income which he hopes to use for his young son’s education and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna Isabel de 37 años de edad, soltera con 4 hijos menores de edad, tiene por actividad económica un acopia de marisco en general, tiene  8 años de tener el negocio , esta ubicado  en una  zona costera y su mayor actividad es la pesca, el negocio lo aprendió del esposo que es marino y hoy en día ha obtenido buenos ingresos gracias a su experiencia, el objetivo del préstamo es invertir en el productos que son los mariscos, como: punches, camarones, jaibas, pescados boca colorada, pardos, entre otros.
texts.en: Reyna Isabel, 37, is single and has four minor children.  Her economic activity is selling seafood in general.  She’s had the business for 8 years and it’s located in a coastal zone whose main activity is fishing.  She learned the business from her husband who is a sailor and today earns good income thanks to her experience.  The goal of the loan is to invest in seafood products like ‘punches’ [type of crab], shrimp, crabs, red-mouth fish and snapper, among others.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Suyapa Ivonne

texts.es: Suyapa Ivonne de 28 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de desempeña como locutor de radio, con dos hijos (gemelos) de dos meses de edad, el objetivo del préstamo es realizar mejoras en su casa de habitación, las cuales consisten en instalar el piso en el cuarto, hacer un anexo en el porche de la casa, los sueños y metas de Suyapa es en un futuro arreglar bien su casita, con el financiamiento comprara material de construcción como: zinc, cemento, arena, piedrin, clavos, pintura, hierro entre otros.
texts.en:
Suyapa Ivonne, 28 years old, married, and with 2 children, now works as a radio announcer. Her children are twins, 2 month old. The objective of her loan is to make improvements to her residence, including installing a floor in one room and constructing an annex to the porch of the house.

Suyapa's dreams and goals for the future include improving her little house. With this financing, she will purchase construction materials such as zinc roofing, cement, sand, gravel, nails, paint, and iron, among other items.

loans.use: buy zinc sheeting, cement, sand, gravel, nails, paint, and iron among other construction materials.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit has been running a clothes trading business for over 10 years in Vanadzor city. She rents a stall at the central clothes fair. Anahit sells women’s and men’s clothes as well. She buys merchandise form Yerevan’s wholesale markets once a week. 

Anahit likes her occupation very much. She is very sociable and thanks to that and to her wide choice of clothes, Anahit has many regular customers. 

Anahit is 44 years old. Right now she lives with her parents, as her husband and her son live in Russia. Anahit’s mother is retired, and her father works as a metalworker at a factory. Anahit’s business is the main source of income for her family.

This is Anahit’s 4th loan from Nor Horizon and now she is seeking a 400,000 AMD loan to buy an autumn clothes assortment to resell. Anahit has never delayed her loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of autumn clothes  to resell

loans.name: Julio Rodolfo

texts.es: Julio Rodolfo de 38 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable quien junto a su esposa trabajan arduamente por sacar adelante a sus dos hijos. Julio cuenta con un terreno en el que se dedica a la siembra de maíz, que posteriormente comercializa en diferentes mercados. Así mismo para contar con una fuente de ingresos adicionales, él posee una tienda de productos perecederos, en la cual vende: pan, huevos, leche, productos de belleza, frutas y verduras entre otros más, con este negocio le ayuda su esposa. Como todo padre responsable Julio desea mejorar la economía de su hogar por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de maíz para sembrar, así mismo para comercializar mayor variedad de productos en su tienda, lo que le permitirá contar con más clientes fijos, lo que será de mucho beneficio para su familia.
texts.en:
Julio Rodolfo, age 38, is a very responsible person. He and his wife work hard so that their two children can get ahead. Julio has a plot of land on which he grows corn that he eventually sells at different markets. At the same time, he generates additional income by managing a store where he sells perishable products such as bread, eggs, milk, fruit, vegetables, as well as beauty products and other merchandise. He manages this business with the help of his wife.

Like all responsible fathers, Julio wants to improve his household finances so he is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to have the necessary funds to invest in planting corn. He will also be able to sell a wider variety of products from his store so that he can acquire more established customers. This will be a great benefit for his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for planting corn.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Maria Cristina es una joven emprendedora de 22 años de edad que decidió montar su propio negocio y esforzarse para brindar a sus padres la posibilidad de gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Desde hace mucho tiempo aprendió la actividad de la fabricación de artesanías, y desde su casa comenzó a fabricar algunas piezas que vendía a sus familiares y amigos. Poco a poco su negocio fue creciendo hasta que hace un mes tuvo la oportunidad de trasladarse a un local donde ahora puede ofrecer sus productos a sus clientes y tiene la oportunidad de atender a una gran cantidad de personas. Desde que su negocio viene creciendo, la situación económica en su hogar ha mejorado, y aunque los problemas económicos no han dejado de aparecer, por lo menos han tenido la oportunidad de gozar de mejores condiciones de vida y poco a poco salir adelante. Debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital que le permita crecer con su negocio, Maria Cristina busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas como madera, pegamento, pinturas para la elaboración de las artesanías y comprar un aviso para su negocio.

Su sueño es llegar a tener un gran local donde pueda atender a una gran cantidad de personas y donde también pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. Además, sueña con que sus padres puedan salir adelante y superar las dificultades que se les han presentado en la vida.
texts.en:
Maria Cristina is a young 22 year old entrepreneur who decided to start her own business and make an effort to offer her parents the possibility of having a better quality of life and better economic opportunity towards progress.  Some time ago she learned how to make arts and crafts and began making them out of her home and selling them to family and friends.  Her business began growing little by little and a month ago she got the opportunity to move to a location where she can offer her products to her current clients and be exposed to a wider variety of people.  Since her business started growing, the economic situation at home has also improved but not disappeared completely.  At the very least they've gotten to enjoy an improved quality of life and little by little they are getting ahead.  Due to the fact that she doesn't have large capital to grow her business, Maria Cristina is seeking a loan to purchase raw materials, such as:  wood, glue, paints to make arts and crafts and to purchase a sign for her business.

Her dream is to have a larger store where she can serve a larger quantity of people and where she can also generate employment for the most at need.  She also dreams of her parents being able to prosper and get past the difficulties that have been present in their lives.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as: wood, glue, paints to make arts and crafts and to purchase a sign for her business.

loans.name: Jimbere Group

texts.fr:
Jeanine fait partie du groupe Jimbere  et  habite à  Ruyigi. Elle a 47 ans et est mariée  à Fulias, commerçant de boutique. Ensemble ils ont 8 enfants  qui étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique (sel, haricot, savons,…). Elle fait aussi le métier de tailleur.

Elle est à son onzième crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter des articles (sel, haricot, savon, …) à revendre dans sa boutique et des tissus pour  coudre les habits à vendre,pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Jeanine is part of the group Jimbere and lives in Ruyigi. She is 47 years old and married to Fulias, a shopkeeper. Together they have eight children, who are students.

She sells shop goods (salt, beans, soaps,…) She also is a tailor by trade.

She is on her eleventh loan with Turame. With this KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and buy some goods (salt, beans, soaps….) to resell in her shop and also some cloth to sew into clothing to sell, so as to earn more.

loans.use: to buy goods (salt, beans, soaps,...) to resell in her shop and some fabrics to make clothing to sell

loans.name: Mwanaidi

texts.en:
Mwanaidi is 28 years old. She is married to Ali, and together they have two children, ages 6 and 2. 

Mwanaidi sells fish, and she has been in this business for the past year and a half. She gets a monthly income of about KES 10,000 from the business.

This is Mwanaidi's first loan from Yehu. She was introduced to us by one of our field officers. She will use the loan to purchase fish and cooking oil. She hopes to open a kiosk in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fish and cooking oil.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de 55 años de edad, casado, con 5 hijos todos mayores de edad, tiene por actividad una carpintería ubicada en la casa de la mama de Miguel ángel, el negocio consisten en la elaboración de muebles como: camas comerciales, juegos de sillas, muebles de oficina, roperos, comedores, cómodas, cunas, entre otros. Actividad que inicie desde hace 18 años, ya que es el oficio que aprendí para sobrevivir, el objetivo del préstamo es la compra de materia prima como madera para la elaboración de los muebles para ofrecer un mejor servicio al cliente.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel, 55, is married with five grown children.  His work is a carpentry shop located in his mother's house.  The business consists of making furniture such as commercial beds, sets of chairs, office furniture, wardrobes, dining room sets, bureaus, cradles, and other items.  He began the business 18 years ago because it is the trade he learned to survive.

The goal of the loan is to buy raw materials such as wood to make furniture to offer better customer service.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as wood to make furniture

loans.name: Yasay María

texts.es:
En el Municipio de el Sauce una preciosa ciudad dedicado en sus actividades comerciales ubicado en el departamento de León, la joven Yasay  es conocido como una persona responsable, trabajador, soltera y sus principales  funciones es desempeñar el cargo de trabajo social, en uno de los organismo, sus principal sueño es mejorar en su salud, para seguir laborando, es por tal razón que la clienta solicito un nuevo crédito con Ceprodel  para esta actividad, anterior mente Ceprodel y kiva le financio un crédito, para la mejora de su vivienda es por tal razón que se presentó para solicitar este tipo de ayuda.     
  
 Actualmente se presentó a Ceprodel  por segunda vez con   el fin de solicitar un crédito para la compra de medicamento  para la mejora de su salud y su desarrollo de vida, para así poder seguir adelante en sus ámbitos laborales, su foto que aparece es la clienta ubicada en su casa de habitación ya realizadas sus mejoras con el crédito financiado. 
Agradezco a dios como primer instancia por haberme encontrado con Ceprodel y Kiva, para que estos me sigan dando la mano para seguir adelante en mi vida.
texts.en:
Yasay lives in the municipality of El Sauce located in León Department, a beautiful city.  She carries out her economic activities there.  She’s known as a responsible, hardworking, single person whose main function is working in social work in one of the organizations.  Her main dream is to improve her health in order to continue working which is why she is asking Ceprodel for a loan.  Ceprodel and Kiva provided her with a previous home improvement loan which is why she came in gain to request this type of help.

She came by Ceprodel for the second time to request a loan to buy medicine to improve her health and develop her life so that she can continue forward with work.  The photo of the client shows her house with the improvements done thanks to the previous loan.  She thanks God for having led her to Ceprodel and Kiva so that they will continue giving her a hand so that she can continue forward in life.

loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bundles of vegetables and sacks of tubers

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: María Antonia, tiene 33 años, es soltera, tiene dos hijos con quienes vive en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Ella siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, anteriormente cultivaba granos básicos y hace 6 años que cultivo una finca de café en el terreno de su casa. Esta producción la vende en grano en el mercado local de la comunidad. Ella ha trabajado con varios prestamos para esta actividad agrícola, actualmente el préstamo que solicita es por 4,000 Lempiras el cual lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para darle mantenimiento a su finca de café. Este préstamo le ayudara mucho ya que al fertilizar su finca espera sacar buena producción. Su meta es ayudar a que sus hijos se superen, estudien para que tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
María Antonia, age 33, is single and has two children who live with her in the town of Gracias, Lempira. She has always engaged in agriculture. María previously cultivated basic grains, but for the past six years she has managed a coffee farm on the land near her house. The coffee beans that she produces are sold at the local market in her community.

María has worked with various loans to fund her farming activities. She is currently requesting a loan of 4,000 HNL so that she can invest in the purchase of fertilizers and pay for labor to maintain her coffee farm. This loan will be a great help since she plans to apply the fertilizer around her farm in hopes of achieving good production. Her goal is to help her children succeed in their studies so that they can have better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor in order to maintain her coffee farm.

loans.name: Pricila Del Carmen

texts.es: Pricila del Carmen de 33 años, soltera con tres hijos menores de edad, tiene por actividad económica un pequeño taller de elaboración de tortillas el cual esta ubicado en su casa de habitación, pricila desde muy joven trabaja con su mama por lo cual ella tiene 20 años de experiencia, en la actualidad ella se ha hecho cargo de taller ya que su mama se lo ha cedido por completo  el cual lo ha administrado muy bien  gracias a su responsabilidad y las ganas y empeño que  lo pone día a día para salir adelante con su hijos que depende  totalmente de ella, el objetivo del préstamo es la compra de maíz por quintal y leña al por mayor.
texts.en:
Pricila del Carmen, 33, is single with three minor children.  Her job is a small shop making tortillas located in her home.  From a very young age Pricila has worked with her mother, so she has 20 years of experience.  Currently she has become responsible for the shop because her mother has completely turned it over to her.  She has managed very well, thanks to her sense of responsibility and the desire and effort she puts into it every day to get ahead with her children, who are totally dependent on her.

The goal of the loan is to buy corn by the quintal and firewood wholesale.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and firewood wholesale

loans.name: Alba Milagros

texts.es: Alba Milagro de 59 años de edad, soltera, con tres hijos mayores de edad, se desempeña como enfermera en un hospital de la localidad donde vive, Alba Milagro ya ha trabajado con Fundación León 2000 la cual ha demostrado su responsabilidad y cumplimiento de pago, el financiamiento lo quiere para hacer mejoras en su vivienda, que consisten en cambiar el techo ya que se encuentra en mal estado divido al sol, agua y los años que tiene de utilidad. Con el financiamiento comprara material de construcción como: zinc, alfajillas, perlines, clavos, entre otros.
texts.en:
Alba Milagro, 59 years old, and single, with 3 grown children, works as a nurse in a local hospital in the town where she lives. Alba Milagro has already worked through Fundacion Leon 2000 and demonstrated her responsability and compliance with her payment schedule.

The financing she wishes is for making improvements to her home, which consist of changing the roof, since it is now in a bad state, due to the sun, water, and the long years it has served. With this financing, she will purchase construction materials such as zinc roofing, rafters, ceiling beams and nails, among other items.

loans.use: buy zinc roofing, rafters, beams, and nails, among other items.

loans.name: Noel Aníbal

texts.es: Noel Aníbal tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar. El se dedica a la agricultura principalmente a la siembra de maíz y frijoles. El señor Noel es un hombre trabajador, responsable y con muy buenas referencias personales. Sus vecinos expresan estar muy satisfechos tanto con su persona como con los productos que ofrece ya que al final del proceso productivo pone  a la venta la cosecha con lo cual logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. Cada año se prepara para la nueva temporada de siembra para la cual necesita invertir en mano de obra alquiler del terreno y en la compra de los fertilizantes necesarios para la obtención de una cosecha abundante. Este año no será la acepción, ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para que le de un impulso en dicha  inversión ya que no alcanza a pagar los fertilizantes que utilizará.  Vale la pena mencionar que él es un hombre bien calificado  en las instituciones financieras, tiene experiencia crediticia por lo que asegura que con los resultados de su cosecha logará cancelar el crédito y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar como siempre lo ha hecho.
texts.en:
Noel Aníbal, 48, lives in his own house with his family group.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans.  Noel is a hardworking, responsible man with very good personal references.  His neighbors state that they are very satisfied both with his person as with the products he sells since at the conclusion of the growth process he sells his harvest which is how he supports his family.

Every year he prepares for the new planting season for which he must invest in labor and to lease land and to buy fertilizer needed to obtain an abundant crop yield.  This year is no exception so he’s decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL so that he can get a little push with the investment since he does not have enough to pay for the fertilizer he’ll use.  It’s worth mentioning that he’s a well-qualified man in financial institutions; he has credit experience which insures that he’ll be able to repay the loan with profits from the sale of his harvest and will be able to continue providing daily bread for his home like he’s done always.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods (cassava, corn) to process into couscous in bulk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: María Virginia

texts.es: María Virginia, es una mujer excepcional y sobre todo ejemplar ya que es muy emprendedora y trabaja duramente para poder sacar a delante a su familia. Hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para ganarse la vida honradamente ya que  para ella lo más importante es que su grupo familiar cuente con lo necesario para subsistir. Ella y su esposo se dedican al cultivo de granos básicos y pipianes. Año con año se preparan para la nueva cosecha la cual esperan sea muy abundante. La señora María cuenta con muy buenas referencias crediticias y personales. Sus clientes la prefieren ya que cuando saca la cosecha ofrece productos de calidad, a muy buenos precios, todo esto  le ha dado prestigio en su comunidad. Todo lo anterior la han motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos (abonos, semilla de pipián, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para el cultivo de pipián ya que es uno de los cultivos que más le favorece y le permite percibir otros ingresos para colaborar con la economía del hogar. Con la cosecha espera obtener los ingresos necesarios para la cancelación del préstamo y para continuar inyectando a la economía familiar.
texts.en:
María Virginia is an exceptional woman and above all quite an example since she’s very enterprising and works hard to be able to move her family forward.  She does everything in her power to earn her livelihood honestly since for her what’s most important is that her family has everything necessary to subsist.

She and her husband grow basic grains and pumpkins.  Year to year they prepare for the new planting which they hope will be abundant.  María has very good credit and personal references.  Her customers prefer her because when she takes in her harvest everything she sells is good quality and her prices are good.  All this has given her prestige in the community.  All the above has motivated her to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in supplies (manure, pumpkin seeds, insecticide, etc.) needed for the pumpkin crops since it’s one of the crops that most benefits her and produces additional income to contribute to the household.  She hopes this harvest will produce enough income to repay the loan and to continue injecting into the family economy.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo  es un campesino muy reconocido y bien recomendado en la zona donde habita. Tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse al cultivo de frijol, maíz y café. Cada año prepara una manzana de tierra para cultivar dichos granos básicos que posteriormente pone a la venta en su municipio. Sus vecinos lo prefieren por ser un hombre honrado, trabajador, sencillo y humilde el cual trabaja muy duro para dar lo mejor a su familia. Como todo campesino está listo para la cosecha del presente año para lo cual necesita invertir en los insumos necesarios para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles ya que esto le permite obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le favorece para suplir las necesidades de su hogar, y es importante tener en cuenta que la agricultura es su principal fuente de ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de abonos, semilla e insecticidas para sus cultivos. El señor Ricardo es un hombre de mucha fe, y espera obtener una cosecha abundante como siempre lo hace y continuar llevando la esperanza a su hogar.
texts.en:
Ricardo is a very well-known and well-recommended farmer in the area where he lives.  He’s been growing beans, corn and coffee for more than 20 years.  Every year he prepares a manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] of land to grow said basic grains which he subsequently puts up for sale in his municipality.  His neighbors prefer him because he is an honest, hardworking, unassuming and humble man who works very hard to provide the best for his family.

Like all farmers, he’s ready for this year’s harvest and needs to invest in the necessary supplies for the corn and bean crops since this will make it possible for him to obtain an abundant harvest that will be favorable for him to meet household needs; it’s important to keep in mind that agriculture is his main source of income.

Because of all the above, he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy manure, seeds and insecticide for his crops.  Ricardo is a man of much faith and he hopes to obtain an abundant harvest like he always does and continue to bring hope to his home.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rabbits and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Cheikh Massamba

texts.fr: Cheikh Massamba est un couturier de profession qui exerce ce métier depuis 12 ans déjà. Il travaillait  avec ses propres moyens jusqu’à ce jour ou il désire contracter un crédit de 100000F CFA afin de pouvoir compléter l’argent  qu’il a pour l’acquisition d’une machine à coudre qui couterait 425000F CFA. Il est âgé de 32 ans, est marié et père d’une gentille petite fille. Comme charges, il s’occupe d’elles et paye aussi l’électricité de son atelier.
texts.en: Cheikh Massamba is a clothier by trade who has business in this business for twelve years already. He used to work with his own funds until now, so he would like to sign a loan for 100,000 francs CFA in order to round out his money for acquiring a sewing machine, which would cost 425,000 francs. He is 32 years old, married, and the father of nice little girl. As for expenses, he takes care of them and also pays the electricity bill in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: Mercedes del Socorro de 45 años , casada , con tres hijos mayores de edad,  se desempeña como oficinista, esta solicitando el financiamiento para hacer mejoras en su vivienda como es cambiar el zinc del área de la cocina, mejoras que por la falta de recursos no la había efectuado, pero gracias al apoyo que Fundación León 2000 y el programa le brinda con el fianancimiento para mejoras de vivienda, con el préstamo comprara material de construcción como: laminas de zinc, perlines, tornillos, pintura, alambre entre otros.
texts.en:
Mercedes del Socorro is 45 years old, married, and has three grown children. She has a job as an office clerk.

Mercedes is requesting a loan in order to make improvements to her home. She plans to replace the zinc sheets in the area above her kitchen. However, she lacks the resources that are needed to make these improvements. Thanks to the support of the home improvement financing program offered through Fundación León 2000, Mercedes will be able to buy construction materials such zinc sheets, crossbeams, screws, paint, wire, and other supplies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for replacing the roof above her kitchen.

loans.name: Hector Jose

texts.es:
En la hermosa ciudad de Pucallpa, caracterizada por su clima cálido y sobre todo por tener una fauna y una vegetación maravillosa; en esta ciudad vive Hector, un joven muy trabajador y entusiasta, el se encuentra estudiando Ingeniería Forestal y ya le faltan pocos meses de estudio para culminar su carrera, en su tiempo libre le gusta mucho leer y sobre todo comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz Chaufa”.

Día a día Hector trabaja en una empresa maderera de su ciudad como empleado, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día, ya que por las noches va a su centro d estudios; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Hector está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar gaseosas, cervezas, abarrotes, entre otros para iniciar su pequeño negocio de bodega, de esta manera el podrá tener un ingreso mas para poder seguir saliendo adelante y poder cumplir su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera”.
texts.en:
Héctor lives in the beautiful city of Pucallpa noted for its hot climate and above all for having a marvelous fauna and flora.  He’s a very hardworking, enthusiastic young man who is studying forestry; he only has a few months of study left to complete his career.  In his free time he enjoys reading and above all to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “Arroz Chaufa.”

Day to day Héctor works in a lumber yard as an employee.  He works about 8 hours daily because he attends classes at night.  He believes that the does well at work because he’s responsible and because he has a strong drive to get ahead.

Héctor is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy soft-drinks, beer and groceries, among others to start his small grocery store and have a source of income to be able to continue moving forward and to reach his greatest dream: to finish his career.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, beer and groceries, among others.

loans.name: Rosa De Jesús

texts.es: Rosa de Jesús de cuarenta y ocho años de edad, habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposo e hijos. Ella es una mujer emprendedora la cual además de sus quehaceres del hogar también le ayuda a su esposo con la agricultura. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para realizar las tareas del hogar y luego trabajar junto a su esposo en las actividades agrícolas. Todos sus vecinos la conocen y dan buenas referencias de ella ya que es una mujer trabajadora, honesta, carismática y sobre todo responsable. Sueña con ver a su familia en mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella y su esposo han tenido. Todo lo anterior la motiva a trabajar duramente para poder ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.  Debido a que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para darle el debido mantenimiento a sus cultivos, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas necesarios como abonos, semillas e insecticidas ya que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha abundante y de calidad.  No pierde las esperanzas que logrará su objetivo de llevar a su familia lo necesario, y poco a poco mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa de Jesus, 48 years old, resides with her family which consists of her husband and children. She is an enterprising woman who in addition to her household duties, helps her husband with agriculture. Every day she rises very early to carry out chores around the house and then, to work alongside her husband in agricultural activities. 

The neighbors know her and give her good references, since she is a hard-working, honest, charismatic and above all, a responsible woman. Rosa dreams of seeing her family in better conditions of life to those which she and her husband have had. All this motivates her to work hard to be able to offer her children a better quality of life.

Since Rosa lacks the necessary economic resources to provide the needed maintenance for her crops, she has decided to solicit this loan through INTEGRAL, to invest in the necessary agricultural supplies, such as fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides, all of which are indispensable to obtain quality and an abundant harvest. Rosa never loses hope that she will achieve her objective of providing her family with its needs, and little by little, improving their quality of life.

loans.use: buy fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides.

loans.name: Aissatou

texts.fr:
Aissatou est une dame de 49 ans qui s’active dans la restauration et ce depuis 3 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Elle démarre sa journée à 8h pour la terminer vers 23h-00h du matin. Elle vient solliciter un crédit de 100000 FCFA pour relancer son activité d’aviculture, qu’elle allie à sa restauration. 
Elle gère sa famille en aidant son mari dans la dépense quotidienne du foyer.
Elle voudrait dans le cours terme, mettre sur pied une unité de production de poulets de chairs régulier ou elle pourra s’approvisionner pour sa restauration.
texts.en:
Aissatou is a 49-year-old woman who has been active in food service for three years. She is married and the mother of four children. She starts her day at 8:00 AM and finishes around 11:00 PM. She is here to request a loan of 100,000 francs CFA to renew her poultry farming business, which is linked her restaurant. 

She manages her family by helping her husband to cover the day-to-day household expenses. In the short term, she would like to start up a production unit of regular broiler chickens, so she can supply her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy some chicks to raise, some to sell and some for her restaurant

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael Antonio de 36 años de edad, es una persona llena de muchos sueños todos con vista al bienestar de su amada familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y tres  pequeños  hijos. Rafael  trabaja sembrando granos básicos, a los cuales también les da todo los cuidados necesarios para realizar un excelente trabajo. Este oficio lo aprendió de su familia por lo que está muy agradecido ya que es el que hasta ahora le permite sostener a su hogar, así mismo para contar con otras fuentes de ingresos, trabaja como cortador de café en las temporadas del años que se realiza esta actividad. Rafael solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de graneros para depositar el maíz y los frijoles que posteriormente comercializara. Así mismo comprará abono, palas, más arados y pesticidas para controlar cualquier tipo de plaga que quiera dañar su cultivo como en años anteriores. Rafael se destaca por ser muy trabajador y responsable, características muy positiva.
texts.en:
Rafael Antonio is 36 years old. He is a person who has many dreams, all of which are geared toward providing for the welfare of his loving family that consists of his wife and three small children. Rafael works by cultivating basic grains. He does everything he can to provide the necessary care for his crops so that he can generate an excellent product. Rafael learned this line of work from his family, so he is very grateful to have the means of sustaining his household. At the same time, he earns additional income by working as a coffee picker in those years when harvesting is taking place.

Rafael is requesting a loan so that he can have the necessary funds to buy seeds for planting corn and beans that he will eventually sell. He will also buy compost, shovels, plows, and pesticides so that he can control any type of threat that could damage his crops, just as he has done in previous years. Rafael is known for being hardworking and responsible, which are very positive character traits.

loans.use: to buy compost and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Duo Luz Del Sol Group

texts.es: Dúo Luz del  Sol, Este Dúo está integrado por el señor Ervin de 34 años de edad cuenta con dos hijos que están en edad escolar, él se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir, tiene su sastrería en su domicilio, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de  materia prima(telas) para la confección de prendas de vestir. Espera que le puedan dar ese apoyo que necesita para seguir con su negocio
texts.en:
Elvin is a member of the "Dúo Luz del  Sol" group. He is 34 and has two school-aged children. 

He makes articles of clothing and has a tailor's shop in his home. 

He is requesting this loan in order to buy raw material, such as fabric for making clothing.  He hopes they can give him that help, which he needs to continue with his business.

loans.use: To buy raw materials, such as fabric for making articles of clothing.

loans.name: Eli Nehemías

texts.es: Eli Nehemías tiene 41 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus tres hijos. Junto a su esposa luchan por sacar adelante a su familia la cual es su principal fuente de inspiración. Desde hace mas de 20 años se dedica a la agricultura principalmente al cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Aprendió el oficio desde que era muy pequeño y ahora es lo que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Su esposa trabaja muy duro en la venta de ropa de forma ambulante, ya que los ingresos percibidos por su esposo no son suficientes para sostener la economía del hogar. Así es como llevan adelante a  la familia y año con año se prepara para la cosecha, la cual este año ya se hizo presente, y necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas como abonos, semillas e insecticidas ya que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha abundante, dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para que le de un impulso en su negocio, el cual es lo más importante que realiza para dar el sustento a su familia. Asegura poder cancelar su deuda una vez sacada la cosecha, la cual espera y confía será muy buena al igual que las cosechas pasadas.
texts.en:
Eli Nehemías, age 41, lives in his own house with his family, which is comprised of his wife and their three children.  Together with his wife he struggles to get his family ahead.  They are his primary source of inspiration.

He has been farming, mainly growing corn and beans, for over 20 years.  He learned this trade when he was very little.  Now it allows him to bring home the daily bread.

His wife works very hard selling clothes in an itinerant manner.  The income that he gets is not enough to support the family.  This is how they get the family ahead.  Every year he prepares for the harvest.

Because planting time is here, he needs to buy farming supplies like fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides.  These are indispensable in order to get an abundant harvest.  

Given that he does not have the financial resources for these purchases, he has made the decision to request a loan from Integral.  The loan is to give his business a boost.  Farming is the most important thing that he does to support his family.  He is sure that he will be able to repay the loan once he has gathered the harvest.  He expects and is confident that it will be very good, just like the past harvests.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Sokhan

texts.en:
A resident from a rural village of the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province, Sokhan is a 40-year-old mother of five children. Four of them, two daughters and two sons, are still dependent on her; some work as garment workers and some are in school. 

The main sources of Sokhan's family income are from farming rice and selling Khmer noodles, and sometimes she also works as a paid worker to earn extra income. She has been in this business for 15 years. With her current businesses, Sokhan manages to save about 4.00 US Dollars (USD) each day. Drought is still the main challenge for her business.

This is the second loan for Sokhan with Kiva partner VisionFund. The first loan has helped her relieve family burden and support her childrens' educations. Now she is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She will also use a portion of it to buy a plot of farmland for expanding her rice growing business. She hopes to make more crop yields so as to improve her lifestyle and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Mbaye

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mbaye est peintre de profession. C’est un habitué de l’IMCEC  car il a eu à bénéficier de plusieurs crédits. Il a une expérience de plus de 10 ans dans le métier. Là il a juste besoin d’un crédit de 100000F CFA pour acheter du matériel pour son activité : une échelle et des planches.
Mbaye est un grand débrouillard car malgré son handicap au niveau de l’œil droit, il travaille pour satisfaire ses besoins st ceux de sa famille. Il vit chez ses parents et participe à la dépense quotidienne.
Il aimerait agrandir son activité avec l’appui de l’ IMCEC.
texts.en:
Mr. Mbaye is a painter by trade. He is a regular at the microfinance institution U-IMCEC because he has had to obtain several loans. He has over ten years of experience in this trade, for which he just needs a loan of 100,000 francs CFA to buy some equipment for his business:  a ladder and some boards.

Mbaye is very good at solving problems because, despite his disability with regard to his right eye, he is working to meet his needs and those of his family. He lives at his parents's place and helps to cover the day-to-day expenses.  

He would like to expand his business with U-IMCEC support.

loans.use: to buy a ladder and some boards for his paint business

loans.name: Duo San Lorenzo Group

texts.es: Dúo San Lorenzo  Este dúo está integrado por la señora María Magdalena de 33 años de edad tiene bajo su responsabilidad a sus dos hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida y refacciones. Desde temprano ella comienza su actividad ya que es bien conocida en el lugar y sus clientes la buscan día a día en su negocio,  está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más mercadería para la elaboración de comidas y refacciones.
texts.en:
Duo San Lorenzo

This group includes Maria Magdalena. She is 33 years old and is responsible for her two children who are minors. She makes and sells food and snacks for a living. She started her business early on and is now well known in the area, with customers that seek her out day after day. 

She is asking for this loan so that she can buy more goods to make food and snacks.

loans.use: to buy goods for the production of snacks (edible goods).

loans.name: Claudia Ramona

texts.es: Claudia Ramona de 53 años de edad, soltera con 3 hijos mayores de edad, tiene por actividad económica compra y venta de cerdos desde hace 5 años, el negocio consiste en la compra y destace de cerdos para vender los productos elaborado con la carne como: carne de cerdo, nacatamales, chicharrón, adobado, mantenga de chancho, moronga, entre otros. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su domicilio y de forma ambulante, el negocio lo inicio con ingresos propio en la actualidad ha crecido gracias al apoyo que León 2000 y el programa kiva le brinda con los financiamientos.
texts.en:
Claudia Ramona, 53, is single with three grown children.  Her job for five years has been buying and selling pigs.  The business consists of buying and butchering pigs to sell the products made with the meat, such as pork, "nacatamales" [Nicaraguan tamales], cracklings, pickled meat, lard, blood sausage, and others.

She carries out her business in her home and as a street vendor.  She started it with her own income.  Currently she has grown, thanks to the support that León 2000 and the Kiva program have offered with the loans.

loans.use: to buy and sell pigs

loans.name: Ericka De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Doña Ericka sigue laborando como técnico evaluador, su hijo creciendo, tiene 8 años ya, cursa el tercer grado, hoy en día está casada y su esposo es operario, también estudia para un futuro mejor. 
La mejora a su cuarto ha logrado con estos financiamiento en Afodenic, el préstamo anterior era para comenzar un anexo, pero el techo se le estaba pasando el agua, lo que logro cambiar, y ahora comenzara el anexo del cuarto y la mejora del baño,para una mejor higiene. Comprara: materiales de construcción en bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, tablas de madera para comenzar la obra. Que se le está haciendo posible a corto plazo, para el bienestar comun.
texts.en:
Ericka continues working as a technical evaluator.  Her son is growing, he is eight years old now and in the third grade. She is married now and her husband is a laborer who is also studying so they can have a better future.

She has been able to make improvements to her home with financing from Afodenic. The previous loan was intended to begin the add-on, but the roof was leaking and she was able to fix it. Now she will begin the addition to the apartment and the bathroom renovation for better hygiene. 

She will buy cement blocks, cement, sand, iron, and lumber to begin the work. This loan is making it possible for the improvements to be done in the short term for the well-being of all.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to add on a room and improve her bathroom.

loans.name: Arabic College Group

texts.en:
Kadiatu is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Kadiatu is about 32 years old and was born in Makeni. She is married and has one child who is attending primary school. Kadiatu has been selling women's clothing for many years. 
This is the first loan that Kadiatu and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, increase sales and consequently improve their living conditions. Kadiatu will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to expand her business. She will buy wholesale women's clothing to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy wholesale women's clothing to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng, aged 49, is a responsible and hard-working woman who has been living in the Prey Chor district. She was married but got divorced in the past few years. She has four children who are currently married and lead independent lives. 
Rice farming has been her major source of income for a long time, as it is the only legacy her parents passed on to her. She has been farming for almost 27 years and earns a decent income to meet the family’s needs.
As now is the time to start raking her soil and transplanting her rice, Seng has requested a loan from HKL and Kiva to pay plowing fees and labor costs incurred in the transplantation. In the future, Seng anticipates owning extra plots of farmland, so that she can yield a satisfactory production each harvest.

loans.use: to pay plowing fees and labor costs incurred in transplanting her rice.

loans.name: Barnaba Fred

texts.en:
Baranaba is a 30-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 3 and 11. All of them go to school.

Baranaba runs a fruit selling stall, and has been in business for 3 years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 3,000 Sudan pounds (SDG) to purchase apples, bananas, and many other items. In addition to this business, she has no other source of income.

In 5 years, Baranaba would like to expand her business and open a big shop. Her major challenges include high prices in the market. She says that she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through Kiva.

loans.use: for buying items like apples and bananas.

loans.name: Nazmieh

texts.en: Nazmieh is a 39-year-old married woman who has 5 family members. She lives in Irbid, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She would like to do maintenance on her house. She wants to provide her family with a good environment to live in.

loans.use: To pay for home improvements

loans.name: Maha

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons, Maha prefers that her photo is not on the internet; the photo above is of her mother. Maha is a 22-year-old single woman from Madaba, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to purchase food products, which she will be selling. This will expand her current business. Her hope is that she and her sister can complete their education. Since Maha is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: To buy food products to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for beauty salon products

loans.name: Hadeel

texts.en: Hadeel is a 20-year-old single woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy clothes, which she sells from her home. She would like to increase the number of products that she sells and open a shop. She would like to expand her business and improve her economic situation. Since Hadeel is 30 years old or younger, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: To pay for clothes to sell

loans.name: Albina

texts.es:
Albina tiene 49 años, está casada con Evaristo, con quien tiene dos hijos de 24 y 9 años. La casa donde viven es propia, la construyeron con esfuerzo, en faldas de una montaña.

Ella se dedica a las labores del campo, especialmente a la agricultura, desde que tenía 20 años. Cuando unió su vida a la de su esposo empezó a trabajar con más ahínco, ya que venían los hijos. Sus principales productos son: papas, arvejas, habas y maíz, pero le da mayor prioridad a las papas. Ella es inteligente, sabe cómo negociar sus productos, por ello viaja a la ciudad de Lima para cada cosecha, pero también ofrece una parte en el mercado mayorista de su localidad. 
Su  meta es ahorrar el dinero suficiente para adquirir un carro y así movilizarse mejor, ya que de su localidad hacia la ciudad es una hora y media de viaje.

Este es su crédito número 10 con MFP, por ello asegura que será puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Pertenece al banco comunal “Las Águilas” y se siente a gusto ahorrando e incrementando su dinero.
Se acerca la temporada de la siembra en grandes cantidades, por ello Albina comprará semillas de papa con la mitad del dinero y la otra mitad será para bolsas de abono.
texts.en:
Albina is 49 years old, and is married to Evaristo with whom she has two children, one 24 years old and the other 9 years old.  They built their house with lots of hard work on the side of a mountain.  For 20 years, Albina has dedicated herself to the labors of the countryside, especially agriculture.  When she married her husband, she began working even more diligently as the birth of her children was near.  Her main products are: potatoes, peas, beans, and rice, though her main crop is potatoes.  

Albina is intelligent, and she knows how to negotiate the sale of her products.  She travels to the city of Lima with each harvest, and she also sells part of her harvest in the main market of near her home.  Her goal is to save enough money to buy a car and to be able to travel more easily as the closest city to her house is an hour and a half drive.  

This is her tenth loan with MFP which ensures she will be punctual with her payments. Albina belongs to the communal bank "Las Aguilas" (The Eagles), and she is pleased to increase her income and save money.  The large planting season is getting closer, therefore Albina will buy potato seeds with half the money and sacks of fertilizer with the other half.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds with half the money and sacks of fertilizer with the other half.

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es: José Alfredo de treinta y seis años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar el cual esta constituido por su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos. El señor José se dedica a la agricultura. Tiene más de 15 años de trabajar como jornal y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desde muy joven aprendió el oficio de la agricultura ya que su familia no contaba con los recursos económicos para darle los estudios escolares. Estos conocimientos son los que le han permitido sacar a su familia adelante ya que como todo campesino la agricultura es la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuentan. Es por esa razón que en esta ocasión solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas e insecticidas) necesarios para los cultivos de maíz y frijoles ya que estos granos básicos son los que más se cosechan en las tierras de su municipio. Como todo hombre de fe, confía que obtendrá resultados positivos los cuales le permitirán continuar llevando el sustento a su familia y poco a poco mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Alfredo is 36 years old, and lives in his own house with his life partner and their three children. José makes a living as a farmer, and has worked for over 15 years as a day laborer to provide for his family. He learned farming and agricultural practices through experience from a very young age, since his family did not have the resources to send him to school. The skills he learned have helped him to support his family and, as a farmer, crops and agriculture are the only sources of income.

José is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL, and plans to use support from the loan to purchase the farming input items (fertilizers, seeds and insecticides) necessary for cultivating corn and beans, the staple crops of the region. As a man of faith, he believes that he will achieve good results for his hard work, which will allow him to continue providing for his family and, little by little, improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds and insecticides.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice, 36, lives in a common law relationship with her spouse. She has two children and lives in the district of Msambweni.

She runs a tailoring business. Her business is home-based, and her customers are from her community. She works hard all day to earn the income needed for her family’s daily sustenance. 

She’s asking Yehu for her second loan of 60,000 KES to cover the construction costs for her rental house, and (more or less) half of it will be used to purchase clothing materials because she wants to always keep her business active. Her biggest dreams are to ensure the continuation of her business and increase her income in order to give her family a better life.

loans.use: To cover the construction costs of her rental home and purchase clothing materials

loans.name: Rosa  Amelia

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo se ha esforzado mucho para sacar adelante a sus hijos, el labora para una  empresa privada y apoya a su esposa con los gastos del hogar y gastos educativos de los niños. ella tambien trabaja como operaria de limpieza y juntos han hido construyendo su mas grande sueño su casa. Gracias a este primer financamiento que Afodenic les otorga comprara los siguientes Materiales: Cemento, Bloques, Hierro, Arena, Piedrin  para emprender su mas grande sueño.
muy feliz Doña Rosa se siente confiada y apoyada con Afodenic quien atravez de fondo kiva ayuda a  personas como ella.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe with her husband who has worked very hard to move their children forward.    He works for a private firm and helps his wife with household expenses and with their children’s school costs.  She also works as a cleaning lady and together they’ve been building their greatest dream: their house.  Thanks to this first loan Afodenic has granted them she will buy the following materials: cement, concrete blocks, rebar, sand and gravel to start making her greatest dream a reality.  

Rosa feels very confident and supported by Afodenic who through Kiva funds helps people like her.

loans.use: Comprara Materiales de Construccion

loans.name: Luciano Antonio

texts.es: A sus 58 años de edad, Luciano Antonio no se cansa de trabajar y sigue luchando por sacar a delante a su familia. Habita en condiciones muy humildes y sencillas junto a su esposa y dos hijos en casa de  su propiedad. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, quien es su principal motivación. El señor Luciano se dedica a la agricultura principalmente a la siembra de frijoles y maíz. Cada año se prepara para la cosecha, que posteriormente pone a la venta.  Esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingresos y lo que le permite dar a su familia el alimento diario.
