He will also sow potatoes, peas and other crops.

He belongs to the communal bank "Productores Hualhua" and this is his eighth loan through MFP.  In all this time, he has taken advantage of the loans to improve his business, increase his capital and obtain more earnings.   Therefore, he is committed to paying back the loan on time.  He enjoys working with his group because they all help each other.

Lucio will use the loan to buy 60 sacks of natural fertilizer to spread on his corn crop.

loans.use: To buy 60 sacks of natural fertilizer to spread on his corn crop.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
Faustina tiene 59 años, está casada con Saturnino, con quien tienen ocho hijos, pero ahora sólo están con uno de ellos. La casa donde viven es la que ella heredó de sus padres hace 30 años.
“Me gusta trabajar en al campo, me siento mal si no trabajo, me enfermo”; con estas palabras Faustina comienza a relatar su trabajo en la agricultura. Siembra maíz, papa y alverja, en sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Las largas jornadas de trabajo la fatigan mucho, pues ya no tiene las mismas fuerzas de antes, pero se siente aliviada cuando en cada cosecha recibe el pago por su trabajo. Cuenta que sus productos los comercializa a la ciudad, a donde ella baja en cada temporada, ahora se encuentra en la cosecha de maíz. Como buena mujer del campo también gusta mucho de criar animales, por ello tiene cerdos, ovejas, gallinas y cuyes.

Este es su crédito número 6 con MFP y con estos préstamos logró invertir en sus cultivos y mejorar su producción, por ello promete seguir trabajando de manera puntual como lo estuvo realizando, además le agrada trabajar en su grupo.  
Faustina invertirá este dinero en la compra de 200 sacos de fertilizantes naturales para sus siembras de papa.
texts.en:
Faustina, 59, is married to Saturnino and they have eight children, only one of whom still lives at home.  She inherited the house they live in from her parents 30 years ago.

"I enjoy working on the land, I feel bad if I don't work, I get sick"; this is how Faustina begins talking about her work in agriculture.  She grows corn, potatoes and peas on her own farmland.  The long workdays make her very tired since she is not as strong as she used to be, but she is relieved when she receives the payment for her work at harvest time.  She says she sells her produce in the city where she goes every season.  Now she is working on the corn harvest and, like every good farm woman, she enjoys raising livestock and has pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs.

This is her sixth loan through MFP and with their help she has been able to invest in her crops and improve production.  That is why she promises to continue working punctually as she has been doing.  She enjoys working in her group.

Faustina will use the loan to buy 200 sacks of fertilizer for her potato crop.

loans.use: To buy 200 sacks of natural fertilizer for her potato crop.

loans.name: Mavel

texts.es:
Mavel tiene 41 años, está casada con Juan, con quien tiene cuatro hijos. La casa donde viven la heredó de sus padres hace 10 años.
Desde que conformó su familia incursionó en la compra y venta de animales. Compra animales pequeños o flacos, los cría en su casa, alimentándolos hasta restablecer su peso ideal. Después de varios meses de dedicación los comercializa a los carniceros de la zona que llegan a su misma casa o los vende en la feria de los domingos en la ciudad, donde traslada a sus animales. Empezó esta actividad por iniciativa de su esposo, quien la apoya incondicionalmente, ya que conocían de las ganancias que obtiene al vender un animal maduro y bien criado; “puedo ganar el doble del dinero que invierto”, comenta.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Productores Huallhua” y este es su crédito número 7 con MFP. En todo este tiempo aprovechó el dinero de sus préstamos para mejorar su negocio, pues pudo aumentar su capital y obtener más ganancias. Por ello, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, además que le gusta trabajar con su grupo porque todos se ayudan entre sí. 
Esta vez, Mavel invertirá en la compra de dos toros y más ovejas.
texts.en:
Mavel is 41 years old and is married to Juan, with whom she has four children. They inherited the house where they live from her parents 19 years ago. When she started her family she began buying and selling animals. She buys small or thin animals and raises them in her house, feeding them until they reach their optimum weight. After many months of dedication she sells them to butchers shops in the zone who come to her door, or she sells them on Sunday fairs in the city, to which she transports the animals. She started this activity on her husband's initiative, her husband supporting her unconditionally, since he realizes that the earnings that can be obtained from a mature and well-raised animal “can earn double the investment” as he comments. 

She belongs to the communal bank “Productores Huallhua” (Huallhua Producers). This is her seventh loan from MFP. During this time she has made the most of the money provided by the loans to improve her business, since she has been able to increase her capital and improve her earnings. For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her repayments. She also likes working with the group because everyone helps each other. This time, Mavel will invest in the purchase of two bulls and more sheep.

loans.use: to buy two bulls and more sheep.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos de 41 años de edad reside con su grupo familia en casa propia. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y responsable siempre con la visión y el deseo de entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia. Carlos trabaja como jornalero y agricultor de granos básicos como lo son frijoles y arroz, él quiere ser cultivando pero se ve en la necesidad de pedir ayuda ya que no tiene lo necesario para comprar insumos agrícolas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo  para la compra de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes y seguir el cosechando  como hasta lo ha hecho el día de ahora. Confía en Dios que pronto que con la ayuda que recibirá podrá cultivar y tender buenas ganancias y así solventar la deuda adquirida antes de tiempo.
texts.en:
Carlos is 41 years old and lives with his family in his own house. He is a very hard-working, honest, and responsible man. He always has the vision and goal to provide a better future to his family. 

Carlos works as day laborer and farmer of basic grains such as beans and rice. He would like to cultivate but he finds it necessary to ask for help. This is because he does not have the means to buy the agricultural ingredients. 

For this reason he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seeds, manure and fertilizer. This will allow him to continue harvesting as he has done until today. 

He trusts in God that soon with the help he will receive he will be able to cultivate and to have a good income. This way he will repay the debt he has taken on ahead of time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Elmer Adalberto

texts.es: Elmer de 27 años de edad vive con su tía y sus primos,  Es un joven trabajador, honesto, responsable y emprendedor su principal sueño es darle mejores condiciones de vida a los que habitan con él. Actualmente trabaja como agricultor de frijoles,  maíz entre otros. Los vecinos hablan muy bien de él tiene buenas referencias ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser atento y servicial. Ya que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios se acercó a INTEGRAL para ver si le brindan ayuda con un préstamo, así este lo empleara con la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, semillas, fertilizantes etc. Espera poder recibir la ayuda solicitada para poder lograr tener abundantes cultivos y a su vez venderlos para poder pagar la deuda antes de lo acordado  y a su vez  poder entregarle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer, who is 27 years old, lives with his aunt and nephews. He is a hard-working, honest, responsible, and enterprising young man. His biggest dream is to provide better living conditions to those who live with him. 

He currently works as a farmer of beans and rice, among others. The neighbors speak very well of him. He has good references as he has always been characterized as attentive and helpful. 

Because he does not have the means necessary he approached INTEGRAL to see if they could offer him help in form of a loan. He will use the loan to buy agricultural ingredients such as manure, seeds and fertilizers etc. He hopes that he can receive the help he is asking for. This will allow him to have plenty of crops. In turn, he hopes to sell them such that he can pay back the debt earlier than agreed. This again will allow him to provide better living conditions to his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural ingredients such as manure, seeds, fertilizer etc.

loans.name: Bat-Erdene

texts.en:
Bat-Erdene is 41 years old and lives with his wife and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife helps his business and his daughter is at the university. He conducted a taxi service business from 2004 to 2006. Since 2007, he has been in the car equipment retail business. 

Currently, Bat-Erdene is well experienced in the car part selling business and the town's residents appreciates him as a diligent man. Bat-Erdene's goal is to increase the rental counter in order to expand his business. Bat-Erdene is requesting 3,000,000 MNT to buy more products to sell.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell.

loans.name: Nicolas Deodanes

texts.es: Nicolás de 36 años vive con su compañera de vida y residen en casa propia. Es un hombre muy honesto y sincero y a su vez trabajador con lo que hace a diario siempre con el deseo de brindarle un mejor futuro a su esposa. Desde hace 10 años realiza la actividad de ser agricultor tiene una gran experiencia con el cultivo de granos básicos como lo son frijol y arroz entre otros. Aparte de esa ser su principal fuente de ingreso posee una  pequeña tienda donde comercializa sus granos ya que es muy conocido por la zona donde vive Nicolás posee de abundante clientela ya que tiene buenas referencias de ser un buen hombre. El desea incrementar sus cosechas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de  insumos de primera necesidad como insecticidas, pesticidas, semillas y abonos de toda clase, cuenta con la satisfacción de que podrá solventar la deuda antes del tiempo acordado ya que tiene la seguridad de que en las próximas cosechas el tendrá los mejores frutos.
texts.en:
Nicolás is 36 years old and lives with his wife in their own home.  He is a very honest and sincere man and a hard-worker.  Everything he does each day is in order to provide a better future for his wife.  For the past 10 years he has worked in agriculture.  He has a lot of experience in cultivating basic grains such as beans and rice, amongst others.  Besides this work which is his main source of income, he also owns a small store where he sells his grains.  He is well known in the region in which he lives and he has many customers.  He has great references and he is known as a good man.

He wants to increase his crop yields and so he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy the necessary supplies such as insecticides, pesticides, seeds, and fertilizers of all types.  He says that he is certain he will be able to pay off the loan before the agreed time and that he is confident that his next harvest will be the best yet.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as insecticides, pesticides, seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Eli Antonio

texts.es: Eli vive con su grupo familia, conformado por su esposa y sus hijos, es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y sincero en lo que hace, posee una gran habilidad y experiencia en el cultivo de maíz y frijol ya que su profesión es agricultor, esto hace que aparte de entregarle lo mejor a su familia día con día se esfuerce mas para realizar de la mejor manera su trabajo. Eli tiene el deseo de superarse un poco más y no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para poder hacerlo por su propia cuenta es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos básicos de primera necesidad como semillas, abonos, insecticidas entre otros. Espera poder recibir la ayuda y de ante mano dispone de su trabajo para poder tener los mejores cultivos de la zona así a su vez poder tener la plena confianza de saldar la deuda y seguirle entregando mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, y cumplir su mayor sueño.
texts.en:
Eli lives with his family which is comprised of his wife and their children.  He is a hard-working, honorable and sincere man and he has a great ability and experience in cultivating corn and beans.  He works in agriculture and he does it so that he can provide the best life for his family.  He works harder every day so that he can get the best results from his work.

Eli wants to get ahead a little more and says that he doesn't have the resources to do so on his own.  Therefore, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and other things.  He hopes to be able to receive support and to work hard in order to have the best crops in the region.  At the same time, he is confident he will be able to repay the loan and provide his family with a better life, which is his biggest dream.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and others.

loans.name: Irma Gabina

texts.es: IRMA ES UNA MUJER SEPARADA, QUE VIVE SOLA CON SU HIJA, ELLA TIENE UN NEGOCIO DE BORDADOS Y COSTURA, DEL CUAL DEPENDE DESDE HACE YA VARIOS AÑOS. IRMA ACUDE A LA SOLICITUD DE UN CREDITO, DEBIDO A LA NECESIDAD DE HACER CRECER SU NEGOCIO Y AUMENTAR SU VARIEDAD DE PRODUCTOS PARA OFRECER UN MEJOR SERVICIO A SUS CLIENTES, DE ESTA MANERA ELLA BUSCA PODER MANTENER SU NEGOCIO ESTABLE Y PRODUCTIVO PARA SOLVENTAR LAS NECESIDADES DE SU FAMILIA.
texts.en: Irma is a divorced woman that lives with her daughter.  She has an embroidery and sewing business that she has managed for many years.  Irma is seeking a loan so that she can grow her business.  She wants to increase the variety of products that she sells and she also wants to offer her customers a better service.  She will then be able to maintain her stable and productive business so that she can provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to invest in her embroidery and sewing business.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José de 62 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida en casa propia. Es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser honesto, responsable y muy feliz de lo que hace todo para vivir de la mejor manera él y su esposa.  Don José es albañil, se dedica construir casas pero también posee un pequeño terreno donde cultiva granos básicos de primera necesidad como frijol y arroz, todo esto para obtener un extra en su sueldo y poder así siempre llevar el pan de cada día a su casa. Además cría ganado  esto a su vez lo vende y así él tiene de donde para seguir cultivando mejor, pero ultimadamente  se ha visto en la necesidad de pedirle un préstamo a INTEGRAL ya que ha estado teniendo problemas con las cosechas y necesita insumos agrícolas como : Insecticidas, pesticidas, abonos u otros. José confía en Dios que sus cultivos mejoraran y agradece de ante mano la ayuda que espera recibir ya que si es así le seguirá brindando lo mejor a su esposa.
texts.en:
José is 62 years old and lives with his life partner in their own house. He is a very hard-working man who has always been known as honest, responsible, and very happy. He is a man who does everything to make his and his wife’s life better. 

José works as a mason and spends most of his time building houses but he also owns a small plot of land. There, he cultivates necessities in the form of staple grains such as beans and rice. He does all this to have a bit of extra salary and to be able to always bring home the daily bread. Besides he also raises livestock which he sells in turn. 

This way he has some means from where to continue improving his cultivating. But ultimately, he saw the necessity to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL because he has been having problems with the harvest. He needs to buy agricultural ingredients such as insecticides, pesticides and manure among others. 

José trusts in God that his harvest will improve. He thanks beforehand for the help that he hopes to receive. Because this is how he will continue to provide the best for his wife.

loans.use: to buy agricultural ingredients such as insecticides, pesticides, manure and others.

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es: Carlos vive con su grupo familiar en casa humilde y sencilla, es un hombre muy honesto, sincero y trabajador, actualmente pertenece a una cuadria de trabajadores del  MOP siempre ha tenido la visión y el deseo de ser trabajador para que su familia este siempre satisfecha y orgullosa de él. Pero aparte es agricultor de granos básicos y de primera necesidad teniendo abundando experiencia en esta labor. Carlos quisiera ver la manera de aumentar sus cultivos es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar una ayuda para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, pesticidas u otros. Para así mejorar sus cultivos y siempre tener la seguridad que en su casa nunca hará falta el pan de cada día. Agradece de ante mano la ayuda que será brindada y tiene la seguridad que solventara la deuda  antes del tiempo acordado.
texts.en: Carlos lives with his family group in a humble and simple home. He is an honest, sincere, and hardworking man. Right now he belongs to a group of MOP workers. He has always had the vision and the desire to be hardworking so that his family is always satisfied and proud of him. But in addition, he is also a farmer of basic grains and basic necessity items. He has a lot of experience in this area. Carlos would like to find a way to increase his crops and taht is why he approached INTEGRAL to ask for some help in buying agricultural materials such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and more. This way, he will improve his crops and always have the security knowing that his home won't lack the daily bread. He gives his thanks beforehand for the help that will be offered and he is sure that he will pay off the debt before the agreed upon time.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and more.

loans.name: Emmalyn

texts.en:
Emmalyn is 23 years old, married and has 2 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Emmalyn has a general store business in the Philippines. Emmalyn requested a PHP 19000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more item like snack foods, shampoo, detergent and other grocery items.

Emmalyn has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Emmalyn would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more items like snack foods, shampoo, detergent and other grocery items.

loans.name: Tseesuren

texts.en:
Mrs. Tseesuren is 30 years old and lives with her husband and two children in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Bayanzurh district, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband, Enhamgalan, runs a freight transportation business. Her older son, Bat-erdene, is 12 years old and a secondary school student.  Her younger son, Batjragal, is 4 years old and attends kindergarten.

Mrs. Tseesuren started her business to sell organic dairy products in 2006. Now, she rents 3 counters for her business in the shopping area known as the "Black Market." She is planning to expand her business. She is a well-experienced and friendly person.  She is asking for a loan of 4,500,000 MNT to purchase more organic products from herders to sell.

loans.use: To purchase more organic products from herders to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stocks of accessories needed for her business.

loans.name: Rith

texts.en:
Rith (in the photo) is 39 years old and sells mangoes. He buys mangoes under contract from villagers from the blooming season till the harvesting season. He needs to use pesticide to prevent mangoes from being attacked by insects. His wife, Chanthou is 33, is a farmer.  

Rith hopes to expand his business by buying more mangoes for resale, so he decided to apply for a loan to increase his capital. 

Rith and his wife live in a suburb of Phnom Penh. They have no children yet.

loans.use: To purchase more mangoes to resell and to buy pesticide

loans.name: Mindulam

texts.en:
Mindulam is 32 years old and lives with her father and mother in the Uvurhangai. Her younger brother, Myagmarsuren,  works in the Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.  She started a recycled materials selling business in 1996. 

She sells to a plastics, cans, and glass scrap's merchant. Now her trading container is located in the center market of Uvurhangai. Her business is sustainable and  has  many regular customers and suppliers. This business is a green business. She wants to buy more products in order to increase the business income as well as profit.  She needs 5,000,000 MNT to purchase more products. She is a laborious and creative woman.

loans.use: to purchase more recycling  products.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a hard-working entrepreneur who has an abaca-weaving business in the Philippines. Fiber from the abaca palm leaf is used for production.

She is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF to buy raw materials for her business.

NWTF is relisting Lorna's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for abaca weaving

loans.name: Ben Mar

texts.en:
Ben Mar lives in their community with his wife and one child. He is 22 years old, a young father that needs to promote his family from poor living.  He has had this farming business for more than three years. This is the only source of income, and it usually gets used for expenses for his family’s daily needs, such as food allowances.

He aims to provide a good future to his family, and to make it achievable, he is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides that would be used on his farm. He is hoping that he will yield better crops by next cropping season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides.

loans.name: Edellin

texts.en:
Edellin works hard to support her family. Edellin is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing net and other equipment. She has been in this business for four years.

In the future, Edellin would like to save enough to improve her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en: This time, Lorena is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to fund her agricultural business. The abaca business that she previously funded through NWTF, a KIVA partner, continues and provides Lorena and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Rose Mae Ann

texts.en:
Rose Mae Ann is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a shell crafts business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy raw materials for her shell crafts business.

NWTF is listing Rose Mae Ann's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials like nylon, shells, etc. for her shell-crafts business.

loans.name: Osita

texts.en:
Osita is married with nine children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Osita is 52 years old and has three children who are in school.

Osita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for five years. In the future, Osita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 46 years old and married. She has 12 children, four of whom are in school.

Teresita is in the agricultural business of raising hogs in the Philippines. Teresita has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Teresita has been raising hogs for three years now. She has borrowed from NWTF five times in the past to sustain her business.

In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food-vending business.

Vilma has been in this business for 10 years. She earns additional income from a general store and from raising livestock.

Vilma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her food-vending business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy used clothes to re-sell.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 33 years old and married. She has three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Gemma has been raising pigs for eight years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

Gemma is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. 

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feedsand vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Prak

texts.en:
Prak is 64 years old and an industrious farmer. She lives in the Prey Chor district in the province of Kompong Cham. She has been farming rice for more than 30 years with the full support of her husband. Prak has four children who are married and live independently. 

Aside from helping her in farming, Prak’s husband devotes his full attention to a carpentry business. He makes furniture such as stools, chairs, desks, beds, tables and similar things. He makes these items based on his customers’ orders. 

Prak would like to borrow a loan from Kiva lenders to help her husband in his business by purchasing carpentry tools such as chisels, and hand and machine planes. Prak will use the remaining funds to renovate her old house for better living conditions. 

Through this loan, Prak hopes that her husband can go a long way in his business and thereby yield more income.

loans.use: to purchase carpentry tools to support her husband's business.

loans.name: Adelfa

texts.en:
Adelfa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling rice grains in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell for her business.

Adelfa has been in this business for 10 years. Adelfa earns more income from buying and selling livestock.

Adelfa has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Thyda

texts.en:
Thyda, 32 years old, and her husband, Sopheak, live in a suburb of Phnom Penh. They have been married since 2001 and have three children--one son and two daughters. Two attend school and another one is still young.  

Thyda is a rice farmer, while her husband buys and sells fruit. She is asking for her first Kiva loan in the amount of $500. She will use $400 to purchase one cow to raise and the $100 remainder will assist in her rice farming by buying fertilizer.  

She will get extra income from selling the cow for beef or sale of a calf when the cow gives a baby. 

Photo: Thyda is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To purchase one cow to raise and fertilizer for rice-farming.

loans.name: Silvina

texts.en:
Silvina is married with seven children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Silvina is 47 years old and has three children who are in school.

Silvina has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Silvina has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Silvina would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Retisa

texts.en:
Retisa is married with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Retisa is 39 years old and has four children who are in school.

Retisa has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Retisa has been in this business for 11 years. In the future, Retisa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Leonicia

texts.en:
Leonicia is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has six children. Leonicia has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for eight years. 

She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. 

Leonicia has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Leonicia hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods,snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is 58 years old, single, and lives in the Philippines. She is a 'barangay' (village) captain and at the same time she is also making and selling longganisa. She has had this business for 11 years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients used in making longganisa  such as fresh meat and spices.

Milagros has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Milagros hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients used in making longganisa (sausage)

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
Keo operates a vegetable selling business from a rented booth in a local market, 13 km from Phnom Penh. She has been doing this for seven years to help her husband in raising their children. She is now 50 years old and married with two single sons. Both of them are in the business of stone carving. They have talent in that type of business. But presently they just work for the shop owner, and they wish to have their own place and become independent entrepreneurs.

Keo wants to support her sons with their transportation needs due to the lack of a family-owned vehicle. She is now asking for a loan in the sum of 1,500 USD to purchase a motorcycle, which will serve them for commuting to their workplace. And with any remainder, she will purchase raw stones for the carving business of her children. Keo hopes that her family will do better someday because of her two sons as they have tried hard in their career.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle, which will serve her children for commuting to their workplace.

loans.name: Julian

texts.en:
Julian is 41 years old, a hardworking and positive person. He is married and raising two children. 

He has been involved in the farming business for over eighteen years. For these years, he made many sacrifices just to meet the needs and wants of his family. He wants to improve their lives through this source of income, his staying power and hard work.

He is now requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 PHP to buy two sacks of seeds, fertilizers and insecticides. These inputs are very vital to develop his business and he will be very happy if his requested loan is given.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. 

Fe has a computer shop that offers computer games. She has had this business for eight years. 

She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy tools for the maintenance of the computer machine.

Fe is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Fe hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tools for the maintenance of the computer game machine.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 59 years old and married. She has three children.

Gloria works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell.

Gloria has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 11 years and also earns an income from fishing and farming vegetables.

Gloria aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.en:
Claudio raises rice to earn a living and sustain his family. He is 52 years old, married and has three grown children. 

He hopes to earn and save more income from his business to offer a comfortable living to his family. To achieve this, he plans to grow his farming business. This caused him to request a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Jenilyn

texts.en:
Jenilyn  is  25  years old, single and lives in the Philippines.

Jenilyn  has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for three years. 

She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. Jenilyn  has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Jenilyn hopes to improve her business so that she can continue her studies.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Battulga

texts.en:
Battulga is 40 years old and lives with his wife, Badamgerel, in a ger district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife is unemployed. His two children live separately. 

He conducted a radio and TV repair business from 1994 to 2002. He has also been well-experienced in the taxi service business. 

He wants to purchase a car for his new taxi service business, but he lacks working capital, so he needs 3,500,000 MNT loan to purchase the car.  

Battulga's goal is to increase his profit and to save the money to start an auto repair service.

loans.use: To purchase the car for his new taxi service business.

loans.name: Mohamed Chérif Aidara

texts.fr:
Notre emprunteur s’appelle Mohamed Chérif Aidara. Il est âgé de 31 ans, marié et père d’un enfant de 2 ans. Il vient pour la première fois d’acquérir un crédit à l’IMCEC. Monsieur Mohamed Chérif Aidara possède une boutique dans le quartier ou il loge. Il demande un crédit afin de pouvoir recharger sa boutique en cette période de ramadan ( jeune des musulmans). A cette période les gens ont tendances à acheter des denrées alimentaires plus que d’habitude. Il exerce ce métier depuis plus de 7 ans. Avec le crédit, il pourra diversifier les produits et services, renforcer ses marchandises et mettre de l’argent de coté afin de pouvoir faire fasse à la dépense quotidienne de son foyer
Dans l’avenir il aimerait élargir son activité et ouvrir un grand magasin d’alimentation générale.
texts.en:
This borrower is Mohamed Chérif Aidara. He is a 31-year-old married father of a  young child, age 2. This is his first loan cycle with the IMCEC. 
Mohamed Chérif Aidara has a grocery store in the area where he lives. He is seeking this credit to restock for ramadan (fasting of muslims) as people tend to buy more food than usual during this period. 

He has been in this business for over seven years. This loan will allow him to diversify his products and services, bolster his stock of merchandise, and save money to cover the daily expenditures of his household. 

In the long term, he would like to expand his business and open a large grocery store.

loans.use: to stock up on food for his grocery store.

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.en: Ilhom is a very clever boy. He graduated school with excellence and good marks. He was one of the best pupils of his school. He likes math, computer, geography, and other subjects. His hobby is playing football. His classmates like him very much. This year he has entered to the Economic University, in the faculty of Management. His parents are workers. Their income is too small to pay for Ilhom’s study at the university. Ilhom wants to be one of the best managers in his town. He is purposeful and hardworking. Please, help him to realize his dream. He is asking for a loan to pay for study at the university. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for study at the university

loans.name: Iroda

texts.ru: Ирода разведенная женщина и воспитывает 4 детей. Она владеет собственном бизнесом и успешно управляет. Она занимается купле продажей женской одежды уже 7 лет. С дохода она обеспечивает семью со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Она развивает свой бизнес с помощью кредитов, которых она получила с Имон Интернешенл и кредиторов проекта КИВА. В будущем Ирода хочет быть успешной бизнес леди и обеспечить детей с хорошим образованием. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки товара, как школьные формы для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
As a divorced parent of four children, Iroda works hard to support her family. She has a clothing sales business in Tajikistan: she has had this business for seven years and earns income for her living conditions.
Iroda has been sustaining her business activities through her past loans from IMON International. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money. In the future, Iroda hopes to improve her business in order to provide for her children's education.	
Iroda is requesting a loan of 3,000 TJS to buy school uniforms for the new season. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase school uniforms for the new season

loans.name: Layhorn's Group

texts.en:
Layhorn, 25, is married and lives with her husband and three children in a village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. All of her three children are dependents and under school age. She and her husband are rice farmers and they supplement their family’s income through planting peanuts and maize. She has been in the rice farming business for six years, earning about 17,200 KHR per day to feed her family. The main challenge for her family’s business is lack of water to better grow her crops. 

Layhorn’s group consists of two members who are female. She is the leader and a third-cycle client with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, while the other member is a second-cycle client. 

She has successfully paid back the past loans, which have helped her family relieve financial burdens and improve their livelihood. Now she is requesting another loan with VisionFund, Layhorn will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Serigne Diop

texts.fr: Serigne Diop est un sociétaire d’un de nos guichets IMCEC. C’est même un habitué puisse qu’il est à son 3ème crédit déjà. Il est cordonnier depuis 20 ans. Serigne Diop aimerait profiter de la période des fêtes qui approche (la Korité qui marque la fin du jeune musulman) pour augmenter sa commande de chaussures afin de pouvoir satisfaire sa clientèle. Il gère sa petite famille : dont sa femme et ses 2 enfants de 6 et 3 ans. Il aimerait diversifier ses produits et services et augmenter son financement auprès de l’IMCEC.
texts.en:
Serigne Diop is a member of one of our IMCEC branches. He works with us frequently and is already on his thrid loan. He has been working as a cobbler for the past 20 years.

Serigne Diop is hoping to benefit from the upcoming festival period (Korite, which marks the end of the Muslim fasting period) to increase his number of shoe orders in order to be able to satisfy his customers.

He is the head of his little family, which is made up of his wife and his two children, who are 6 and 3 years old. He would like to diversify his products and services and increase his financing from the IMCEC.

loans.use: to buy the raw materials he needs to make and sell shoes

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: El Sr. Francisco de 68 años de edad es casado y ya no tiene dependientes económicos, a pesar de su edad el Sr. Francisco no se da por vencido y quiere siempre brindarle lo mejor a su esposa. El y su esposa se ganan la vida vendiendo boletos de auto transporte, además de contar con la pensión de Francisco. El esta solicitando nuestra ayuda para dar mantenimiento a su casa, realizar mejoras tales como pintar, enjarrar y remodelar algunas partes de su casa. El y su esposa agradecerán la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 68, is married and has no financial dependents.  In spite of his age, Francisco does not give up.  He wants to always give his wife the best.

He and his wife earn a living selling tickets for transportation by car.  They also have Francisco’s pension.

He is requesting our help to provide maintenance on his house.  He will make improvements like painting, plastering and remodeling some parts of the house.  He and his wife will be grateful for the help they are given.

loans.use: to remodel his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her father's medical expenses.

loans.name: Leo

texts.es: Leo Hernández de 26 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida e hijo. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. Cada año realiza la siembra de cilantro, dicha actividad es su principal fuente de ingresos y es de esta forma como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Su sueño es mejorar  su calidad de vida  y la de su familia ya que viven en condiciones muy humildes y desea darles algo mejor.  Esto lo motiva a trabajar con más entusiasmo ya que con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo logrará dar a su familia lo que tanto desea. Es por eso que ha tomado la decisión de acercarse  a INTEGRAL  para solicitar este nuevo crédito que le permita invertir en los insumos agrícolas como abonos, insecticidas, etc. necesarios para el cultivo de la tierra y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Leo Hernández, age 26, lives in his own house with his life partner and his son.  He has been farming for many years.  Each year he plants cilantro, which is his main source of income.  This is the way he earns a living and supports his household.

His dream is to improve his quality of life and that of his family.  This is because they live in very humble conditions, and he wishes to give them something better.  This motivates him to work with more enthusiasm.  This is because with great effort and work he will manage to give his family what he wants so much.

That is why he decided to approach Integral in order to request this new loan.  The loan will allow him to invest in agricultural supplies like fertilizers and insecticides, etc.  He needs this to cultivate the land and to continue bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like fertilizers and insecticides, etc.

loans.name: David Flaminio

texts.es: David de 32 años de edad, reside en casa humilde pero propia con su grupo familiar, su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor que lo que a él más le interesa es el futuro y bienestar de su familia. Es jornalero se dedica a cultivar frijoles y arroz siendo estos su principal fuente de ingreso ya que los comercializa con vecinos aledaños a su casa. David necesita un préstamo para poder comprar insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos y que en el transcurso de la cosecha no vaya a tener algún problema es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL a para poder ver si le permiten comprar: semillas, abonos, insecticidas entre otros, tiene el deseo de poder superarse así mismo y a su familia y cuenta con muchas ganas para poder hacerlo agradece la ayuda que pronto espera recibir y cuenta con la seguridad que con las próximas cosechas podrá pagar la deuda adquirida.
texts.en:
David, age 32, lives in a humble house which he owns with his family, his wife and two children. He is a hardworking and enterprising man, whose main interest is the future and wellbeing of his family. David farms beans and rice, which he sells to neighbors. This is his main source of income.

David needs a loan to buy agricultural inputs to insure a good harvest. For this reason, he approached INTEGRAL to apply for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide, among other supplies. David wants to create a better life for himself and for his family, and is very committed to his goal. He is very grateful for this loan, which he hopes to receive soon, and is confident that he will be able to repay his debt with the next harvest.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Phal's Group

texts.en:
A married mother of six children, Phal is age fifty and lives in a rural village of the Prey Chhor district located in Kampong Cham province. Out of the six children, she still has two (one daughter and one son) dependent children to take care of and who are still in school. To feed her family she farms rice, and this is the main source of her family’s income. Phal has been in this business for thirty-three years. Lacking working capital to support this business has always been the main challenge for her. 

Phal’s group consists of three female members who live in the same village, and this is their second loan with VisionFund. The first loan has helped Phal to relieve her family’s burden. With the second loan from VisionFund, Phal is leading her group to apply for loans of KHR 1,000,000 each and she plans to use her portion to spend on farmland preparation, to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor fees. Phal hopes this loan will allow her to increase her family’s income so that her family can live in better conditions, to have a proper house and sufficient finances for maintaining her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and to spend on land preparation and labor fees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is 64 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 10 children. Anastacia has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for 6 years. 

She requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.  She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Anastacia hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Muong

texts.en:
Muong is a 43-year-old married woman who has been residing in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province. She and her husband help each other in managing their rice fields to ensure healthier crops each harvest. Muong has three children. The oldest child is already married and the other two are now working as laborers in Korea. Muong doesn’t want to rely on her sons’ remittances, so she has tried hard in farming and also a hog-raising business for more income.

With the amount of 1,200 USD, Muong will purchase a motorcycle for home use as well as for the support of her business. This will better her living conditions and help in their transportation needs. Moreover, she can increase her savings by avoiding her transportation costs.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for home use as well as for the support of her business.

loans.name: Bertoldo

texts.en:
Bertoldo is 51 years old, single and lives in the Philippines.  

Bertoldo is buying and selling food supplements in his community. He has had this business for eight years. 

He requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos to buy more food supplements to resell.

Bertoldo is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Bertoldo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy more food supplements to resell.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en: Wilma is 44 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. Wilma is providing motorela (motorcycle transport) services with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for six years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service. Wilma has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Wilma hopes to improve her services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Netchill

texts.en: Netchill is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. Netchill is providing motorela (motorcycle transport) services with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services. Netchill has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Netchill hopes to improve her services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Mariyln

texts.en:
This is Marilyn. She previously accessed a 25,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts, accessories and for the maintenance of their jeepney. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their jeepney. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to cover their daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marilyn dreams of having another vehicle in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the spare parts and maintenance of their jeepney.

loans.name: Lomer

texts.en:
Lomer is 56 years old, has three children and is married to a housekeeper named Florestina. Lomer is a farmer who grows rice and sell to traders at their village. He spends the income from the business in paying school fees of his children and also for daily meals. He is now asking for a loan of P15,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming. This will help ensure a productive harvest from the farm. 

Someday, with good yield and profits, Lomer will be able to save funds for matriculation fees and emergency expenses of the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 1 child. He provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy tools & pay for gasoline for the services. Richard has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, he hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Zubaida

texts.en:
Zubaida is a 39-year-old woman living in the remote area of Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her family consists of 2 sons and a daughter. Her husband has owned a small motor mechanic shop for the past two years and needs additional capital for the growth of his shop. He is very hardworking and an honest person, and his biggest aim in life is to provide quality education to his children and fulfill their other basic needs.

Zubaida has requested a loan of PKR 15,000 from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for the expansion of her husband's motor mechanic shop. She is confident that the financing will be productive for them and will greatly contribute towards a considerable increase in their monthly income.

loans.use: To expand her husband's motor mechanic shop.

loans.name: Ruom's Group

texts.en:
Ruom is aged 62 years and is married with three children. He and his family live in a village of the Sangke district of Battambang province. To make a living, he and his wife have been farming rice and planting cassava for several years, earning about 27,900KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

Ruom is in his third loan cycle as a client, while his fellow group member is in her fourth loan cycle with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. He has successfully used the past loans to improve his family’s livelihood. Now he is leading his group to apply for a loan with VisionFund. He will use his portion to buy fertilizers for his farmland. With this loan, he hopes to grow his crops better and produce higher yields in order for him to increase his family’s income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his farmland.

loans.name: Martine

texts.fr: Martine est une femme de 44 ans mariée, mère de 5 enfants dont l'age varie entre 12 et 28 ans, deux vont encore à l'école. Elle commercialise dans un marché de la capitale depuis 20 ans déjà les vivres en fonction des saisons. Elle aimerait agrandir son activité en achetant ses produits en gros (sacs), ça lui évitera les ruptures de stocks qu'elle a tout le temps. ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle déjà grandissante, mais aussi d'augmenter ses bénéfices. Bénéfices qui lui permettront de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille  dont elle a la charge en partie, économiser pour leurs scolarités et avec le temps, d'agrandir son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Martine is a married woman, 44 years old, and  the mother of five children, from 12 to 28 years old, of whom two are still in school. She has been selling seasonal staple foods at a market in the capital for twenty years already. She would like to expand her business by buying some goods in bulk (in sacks). This will prevent inventory shortages she has all the time. 

This loan will enable her not only to satisfy her already-growing customer base but also to increase her profits. The profits will allow her to meet the needs of her family, supported in part by her; to save money for schooling costs; and to grow her business capital with time.

loans.use: to buy bundles of vegetables (okok) and sacks of palm nuts

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Agnck est inauguré le 18 Mai 2007. Les membres de ce groupe habitent en parfaite harmonie dans ce villa de Agnack et les environs. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Mme Sountou est l'emprunteur vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 50 ans, mariée et mère de 07 enfants (04 filles et 03 garçons) âgés entre 35 et 20 ans. Sur la photo, elle est à droite avec la main levée.
Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter des mangues pour les revendre. Les bénéfices vont aider à la prise en charge de sa famille et éventuellement augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
The Agn[a]ck group has been created on May 18, 2007. The group members live in perfect accord in the  village of Agnack and nearby. Their main line of business is retail.

Mrs. Sountou is the star borrower of the group. She is 50 years old, married and the mother of seven  children (four daughters and three sons) ranging from 35 to 20 years of age. In the photo, she is on the right raising her hand. With this loan, she plans to buy mangoes for resale. Her revenues will help her provide for family needs and, over time, grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and vegetables for resale in the village

loans.name: Fausto Antonio

texts.es: Fausto de 66 años, vive en su humilde vivienda junto a su esposa e hijo. Cuenta ya con una gran experiencia en el cultivo de granos básicos como el maíz y arroz ya que este junto a la crianza de ganado y cerdos son su principal fuente de ingresos. Fausto es una persona dinámica, trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora que siempre busca la manera de sacar adelante a su familia, es por eso que tanto de vecinos como de su clientela solo se reciben buenas referencias. Ya que la época de cultivo se acerca Fausto quiere prepararse para que su cosecha sea de primera calidad y así seguir dándole a su fiel clientela los mejores productos del mercado, es por eso que tomo la decisión de acercarse a una agencia de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito que le ayudara para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas, semillas, etc. que le permitirán como en los años anteriores producir una excelente cosecha.
texts.en:
Fausto, age 66, lives in a humble dwelling with his wife and child. He has many years of experience in farming staple grains such as corn and rice. These crops, along with the sheep and pigs he raises, provide Fausto's principal source of income. He is a dynamic, hardworking, responsible and enterprising person who is always pursuing ways to provide a better life for his family. It is no surprise that his neighbors and customers alike have only good references for him.
 
Since the farming season is approaching, Fausto wants to insure that his harvest will be of the finest quality, so that he can continue providing his loyal customers with the best products on the market. For this reason, he decided to approach INTEGRAL to request a loan that will help him buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, pesticide, seeds, etc. These supplies will allow Fausto to again produce an excellent harvest.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, pesticide, seeds, etc.
